GV03sb_03_u:297: sarasvatyai pūṣṇe 'gnaye svāheti | vāgvai sarasvatī vāgyajñaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:298: sāsyaiṣātmandevatādhītā bhavati vākpaśavo vai pūṣā puṣṭirvai pūṣā puṣṭiḥ paśavaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:299: paśavo hi yajñaste 'syaita ātmanpaśava ādhītā bhavanti tadyadasyaitā ātmandevatā
GV03sb_03_u:302: atha caturthī juhoti | āpo devīrbṛhatīrviśvaśambhuvo dyāvāpṛthivī uro antarikṣa
GV03sb_03_u:303: bṛhaspataye haviṣā vidhema svāhetyeṣā ha nedīyo yajñasyāpāṃ hi kīrtayatyāpo hi
GV03sb_03_u:304: yajño dyāvāpṛthivī uro antarikṣeti lokānāṃ hi kīrtayati bṛhaspataye haviṣā vidhema
GV03sb_03_u:305: svāheti brahma vai bṛhaspatirbrahma yajña eteno haiṣā nedīyo yajñasya
GV03sb_03_u:307: atha yām pañcamīṃ srucā juhoti | sā haiva pratyakṣaṃ yajño 'nuṣṭubhā hi tāṃ juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:310: atha yaddhruvāyāmājyam pariśiṣṭam bhavati | tajjuhvāmānayati triḥ
GV03sb_03_u:311: sruveṇājyavilāpanyā adhi juhvāṃ gṛhṇāti yattṛtīyaṃ gṛhṇāti tatsruvamabhipūrayati
GV03sb_03_u:313: sa juhoti | viśvo devasya neturmarto vurīta sakhyam viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:316: saiṣā devatābhiḥ paṅktirbhavati | viśvo devasyeti vaiśvadevaṃ neturiti sāvitram marto
GV03sb_03_u:317: vurīteti maitraṃ dyumnaṃ vṛṇīteti bārhaspatyaṃ dyumnaṃ hi bṛhaspatiḥ puṣyasa iti
GV03sb_03_u:320: saiṣā devatābhiḥ paṅktirbhavati | pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pañcartavaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:323: tāṃ vā anuṣṭubhā juhoti | vāgvā anuṣṭubvāgyajñastadyajñam pratyakṣamāpnoti
GV03sb_03_u:325: tadāhuḥ | etāmevaikāṃ juhuyādyasmai kāmāyetarā hūyanta etayaiva taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:326: kāmamāpnotīti tāṃ vai yadyekāṃ juhuyātpūrṇāṃ juhuyātsarvaṃ vai pūrṇaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:330: tāṃ vā anuṣṭubhā juhoti | saiṣānuṣṭupsatyekatriṃśadakṣarā bhavati daśa pāṇyā
GV03sb_03_u:331: aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā ātmaikatriṃśo yasminnete prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitā
GV03sb_03_u:332: etāvānvai puruṣaḥ puruṣo yajñaḥ puruṣasammito yajñaḥ sa yāvāneva yajño
GV03sb_03_u:337: dakṣiṇenāhavanīyam prācīnagrīve kṛṣṇājine upastṛṇāti | tayorenamadhi dīkṣayati
GV03sb_03_u:338: yadi dve bhavatastadanayorlokayo rūpaṃ tadenamanayorlokayoradhi dīkṣayati
GV03sb_03_u:340: sambaddhānte bhavataḥ | sambaddhāntāviva hīmau lokau tardmasamute
GV03sb_03_u:343: yadyu eka bhavati | tadeṣāṃ lokānāṃ rūpaṃ tadenameṣu lokeṣvadhi dīkṣayati yāni
GV03sb_03_u:344: śuklāni tāni divo rūpaṃ yāni kṛṣṇāni tānyasyai yadi vetarathā yānyeva kṛṣṇāni tāni
GV03sb_03_u:345: divo rūpaṃyāni śuklāni tānyasyai yānyeva babhrūṇīva harīṇi tānyantarikṣasya rūpaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:348: antakamu tarhi paścātpratyasyet | tadimāneva lokānmithunīkṛtya teṣvenamadhi
GV03sb_03_u:351: atha jaghanena kṛṣṇājine paścāt prāṅ jānvākna upaviśati sa yatra śuklānāṃ ca
GV03sb_03_u:352: kṛṣṇānāṃ ca saṃdhirbhavati tadevamanimṛśya japatyṛkṣāmayoḥ śilpe stha iti yadvai
GV03sb_03_u:353: pratirūpaṃ tacilpamṛcāṃ ca sāmnāṃ ca pratirūpe stha ityevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:355: te vāmārabha iti | garbho vā eṣa bhavati yo dīkṣate sa candāṃsi praviśati
GV03sb_03_u:356: tasmānnvaknāṅguliriva bhavati nyaknāṅgulaya iva hi garbhāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:358: sa yadāha | te vāmārabha iti te vām praviśāmītyevaitadāha te mā pātamāsya
GV03sb_03_u:359: yajñasyodṛca iti te mā gopāyatamāsya yajñasya saṃsthāyā ityevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:361: atha dakṣiṇena jānunārohati | śarmāsi śarma me yaceti carma vā etatkṛṣṇasya
GV03sb_03_u:362: tadasya tanmānuṣaṃ śarma devatrā tasmādāha śarmāsi śarma me yaceti namaste astu
GV03sb_03_u:363: mā mā hiṃsīriti śreyāṃsaṃ vā eṣa upādhirohati yo yajñaṃ yajño hi kṛṣṇājinaṃ tasmā
GV03sb_03_u:364: evaitadyajñāya nihnute tatho hainameṣa yajño na hinasti tasmādāha namaste astu
GV03sb_03_u:367: sa vai jaghanārdha ivaivāgra āsīta | atha yadagra eva madhya upaviśedya enaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:368: tatrānuṣṭhyā hareddrapsyati vā pra vā patiṣyatīti tathā haiva syāttasmājjaghanārdha
GV03sb_03_u:371: atha mekhalām pariharate | aṅgiraso ha vai dīkṣitānabalyamavindatte
GV03sb_03_u:373: ātmana ūrjamadadhata samāptiṃ tayā samāpnuvaṃstatho evaiṣa etām madhyata
GV03sb_03_u:376: sā vai śāṇī bhavati | mṛdvyasaditi nveva śāṇī yatra vai prajāpatirajāyata garbho
GV03sb_03_u:378: yadvasya jarāyvāsīttaddīkṣitavasanamantaraṃ vā ulbaṃ jarāyuṇo bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:379: tasmādeṣāntarā vāsaso bhavati sa yathaivātaḥ prajāpatirajāyata garbho
GV03sb_03_u:382: sā vai trivṛdbhavati | trivṛddhyannam paśavo hyannam pitā mātā yajjāyate tattṛtīyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:385: muñjavalśenānvastā bhavati | vajro vai śaro virakṣastāyai stukāsargaṃ sṛṣṭā bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:386: sā yatprasalavi sṛṣṭā syādyathedamanyā rajjavo mānuṣī syādyadvapasalavi sṛṣṭā
GV03sb_03_u:393: atha nīvimudgūhate | somasya nīvirasītyadīkṣitasya vā asyaiṣāgre
GV03sb_03_u:394: nīvirbhavatyathātra dīkṣitasya somasya tasmādāha somasya nīvirasīti
GV03sb_03_u:396: atha prorṇute | garbho vā eṣa bhavati yo dīkṣate prāvṛtā vai garbho ulbeneva
GV03sb_03_u:399: sa prorṇute | viṣṇoḥ śarmāsi śarma yajamānasyetyubhayaṃ vā eṣo 'tra bhavati yo
GV03sb_03_u:400: dīkṣate viṣṇuśca yajamānaśca yadaha dīkṣate tadviṣṇurbhavati yadyajate
GV03sb_03_u:403: atha kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāṃ sici badhnīte | devāśca vā asurāścobhaye prājāpatyāḥ prajāpateḥ
GV03sb_03_u:404: piturdāyamupeyurmana eva devā upāyanvācamasurā yajñameva taddevā
GV03sb_03_u:407: te devā yajñamabruvan | yoṣā vā iyaṃ vāgupamantrayasva hvayiṣyate vai tveti
GV03sb_03_u:408: svayaṃ vā haivaikṣata yoṣā vā iyaṃ vāgupamantrayai hvayiṣyate vai meti
GV03sb_03_u:409: tāmupāmantrayata sā hāsmā ārakādivaivāgra āsūyattasmādu strī
GV03sb_03_u:410: puṃsopamantritārakādivaivāgre 'sūyati sa hovācārakādiva vai ma āsūyīditi
GV03sb_03_u:412: te hocuḥ | upaiva bhagavo mantrayasva hvayiṣyate vai tveti tāmupāmantrayata sā
GV03sb_03_u:413: hāsmai nipalāśamivovāda tasmādu strī puṃsopamantritā nipalāśamivaiva vadati sa
GV03sb_03_u:416: te hocuḥ | upaiva bhagavo mantrayasva hvayiṣyate vai tveti tāmupāmantrayata sā
GV03sb_03_u:417: hainaṃ juhuva tasmādu strī pumāṃsaṃ hvayata evottamaṃ sa hovācāhvata vai meti
GV03sb_03_u:419: te devā īkṣāṃ cakrire | yoṣā vā iyaṃ vāgyadenaṃ na yuvitehaiva mā
GV03sb_03_u:420: tiṣṭhantamabhyehīti brūhi tām tu na āgatām pratiprabrūtāditi sā hainaṃ tadeva
GV03sb_03_u:421: tiṣṭhantamabhyeyāya tasmādu strī pumāṃsaṃ saṃskṛte tiṣṭhantamabhyaiti tāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:426: taddevāḥ svyakurvata te 'surā āttavacaso he 'lavo he 'lava iti vadantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ
GV03sb_03_u:428: tatraitāmapi vācamūduḥ | upajijñāsyāṃ sa mlecastasmānna brāhmaṇo mlecedasuryā
GV03sb_03_u:429: haiṣā vā natevaiṣa dviṣatāṃ sapatnānāmādatte vācaṃ te 'syāttavacasaḥ parābhavanti
GV03sb_03_u:432: so 'yaṃ yajño vācamabhidadhyau | mithunyenayā syāmiti tāṃ saṃbabhūva
GV03sb_03_u:434: indro ha vā īkṣāṃ cakre | mahadvā ito 'bhvaṃ janiṣyate yajñasya ca
GV03sb_03_u:435: mithunādvācaśca yanmā tannābhibhavediti sa indra eva garbho bhūtvaitanmithunam
GV03sb_03_u:438: sa ha saṃvatsare jāyamāna īkṣāṃ cakre | mahāvīryā vā iyaṃ yoniryā māmadīdharata
GV03sb_03_u:439: yadvai meto mahadevābhvaṃ nānuprajāyeta yanmā tannābhibhavediti
GV03sb_03_u:441: tām pratiparāmṛśyaveṣṭyācinat | tāṃ yajñasya śīrṣanpratyadadhādyajño hi kṛṣṇaḥ sa
GV03sb_03_u:442: yaḥ sa yajñastatkṛṣṇājinaṃ yo sā yoniḥ sā kṛṣṇaviṣāṇātha yadenāmindra
GV03sb_03_u:446: tāṃ vā uttānāmiva badhnāti | uttāneva vai yonirgarbham bibhartyatha dakṣiṇām
GV03sb_03_u:447: bhruvamuparyupari lalāṭamupaspṛśatīndrasya yonirasītīndrasya hyeṣā yonirato vā
GV03sb_03_u:448: hyenām praviśanpraviśatyato vā jāyamāno jāyate tasmādāhendrasya yonirasīti
GV03sb_03_u:450: athollikhati | susasyāḥ kṛṣīskṛdhīti yajñamevaitajjanayati yadā vai suṣamam
GV03sb_03_u:451: bhavatyathālaṃ yajñāya bhavati yado duḥṣamam bhavati na tarhyātmane canālam
GV03sb_03_u:454: atha na dīkṣitaḥ | kāṣṭhena vā nakhena vā kaṇḍūyeta garbho vā eṣa bhavati yo
GV03sb_03_u:455: dīkṣate yo vai garbhasya kāṣṭhena vā nakhena vā kaṇḍūyedapāsyanmrityettato
GV03sb_03_u:456: dīkṣitaḥ pāmano bhavitordīkṣitaṃ vā anu retāṃsi tato retāṃsi pāmanāni janitoḥ svā
GV03sb_03_u:457: vai yonī reto na hinastyeṣā vā etasya svā yonirbhavati yatkṛṣṇaviṣāṇā tatho
GV03sb_03_u:458: hainameṣā na hinasti tasmāddīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇaviṣāṇayaiva kaṇḍūyeta nānyena
GV03sb_03_u:461: athāsmai daṇḍam prayacati | vajro vai daṇḍo virakṣastāyai
GV03sb_03_u:463: audumbaro bhavati | annaṃ vā ūrgudumbara ūrjo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV03sb_03_u:466: mukhasammito bhavati | etāvadvai vīryaṃ sa yāvadeva vīryaṃ tāvāṃstadbhavati
GV03sb_03_u:469: tamucrayati | ucrayasva vanaspata ūrdhvo mā pāhyaṃhasa āsya yajñasyodṛca ityūrdhvo
GV03sb_03_u:472: atra haike | aṅguliśca nyacanti vācaṃ ca yacantyato hi kiṃ ca na japiṣyanbhavatīti
GV03sb_03_u:473: vadantastadu tathā na kuryādyathā parāñcaṃ dhāvantamanulipseta taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:474: nānulabhetaivaṃ ha sa yajñaṃ nānulabhate tasmādamutraivāṅgulīrnyacedamutra
GV03sb_03_u:477: atha yaddīkṣitaḥ | ṛcaṃ vā yajurvā sāma
GV03sb_03_u:481: atha yadvācaṃ yacati | vāgvai yajño yajñamevaitadātmandhatte 'tha yadvācaṃyamo
GV03sb_03_u:482: vyāharati tasmādu haiṣa visṛṣṭo yajñaḥ parāṅāvartate tatro vaiṣṇavīmṛcaṃ vā
GV03sb_03_u:483: yajurvā japedyajño vai viṣṇustadyajñam punarārabhate tasyo haiṣā prāyaścittiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:485: athaika udvadati | dīkṣito 'yam brāhmaṇo dīkṣito 'yam brāhmaṇa iti
GV03sb_03_u:486: niveditamevainametatsantaṃ devebhyo nivedayatyayam mahāvīryo yo yajñam
GV03sb_03_u:487: prāpadityayaṃ yuṣmākaiko 'bhūttaṃ gopāyatetyevaitadāha triṣkṛtva āha trivṛddhi
GV03sb_03_u:490: atha yadbrāhmaṇa ityāha | anaddheva vā asyātā purā jānam bhavatīdaṃ hyāhū
GV03sb_03_u:491: rakṣāṃsi yoṣitamanusacante taduta rakṣāṃsyeva reta ādadhatītyathātrāddhā jāyate
GV03sb_03_u:492: yo brahmaṇo yo yajñājjāyate tasmādapi rājanyaṃ vā vaiśyaṃ vā brāhmaṇa ityeva
GV03sb_03_u:493: brūyādbrahmaṇo hi jāyate yo yajñājjāyate tasmādāhurna savanakṛtaṃ hanyādenasvī
GV03sb_03_u:497: vācaṃ yacati | sa vācaṃyama āsta āstamayāttadyadvācaṃ yacati
GV03sb_03_u:499: yajñena vai devāḥ | imāṃ jitiṃ jigyuryaiṣāmiyaṃ jitiste hocuḥ kathaṃ na idam
GV03sb_03_u:500: manuṣyairanabhyārohyaṃ syāditi te yajñasya rasaṃ dhītvā yathā madhu madhukṛto
GV03sb_03_u:504: tadvā ṛṣīṇāmanuśrutamāsa | te yajñaṃ samabharanyathāyaṃ yajñaḥ sambhṛta evaṃ vā
GV03sb_03_u:505: eṣa yajñaṃ sambharati yo dīkṣate vāgvai yajñaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:507: tāmastamite vācaṃ visṛjate | saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiryajño 'horātre vai
GV03sb_03_u:508: saṃvatsara ete hyenam pariplavamāne kurutaḥ so 'hannadīkṣiṣṭa sa rātrim prāpatsa
GV03sb_03_u:509: yāvāneva yajño yāvatyasya mātrā tāvantamevaitadāptvā vācaṃ visṛjate
GV03sb_03_u:511: taddhaike | nakṣatraṃ dṛṣṭvā vācaṃ visarjayantyatrānuṣṭyāstamito bhavatīti
GV03sb_03_u:512: vadantastadu tathā na kuryātkva te syuryanmeghaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:515: aneno haike vācaṃ visarjayani | bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti yajñamāpyāyayāmo yajñaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:516: saṃdadhma iti vadantastadu tathā na kuryānna ha sa yajñamāpyāyayati na saṃdadhāti
GV03sb_03_u:519: anenaiva vācaṃ visarjayet | vrataṃ kṛṇuta vrataṃ kṛṇutāgnirbrahmāgniryajño
GV03sb_03_u:520: vanaspatiryajñiya ityeṣa hyasyātra yajño bhavatyetaddhaviryathā purāgnihotraṃ
GV03sb_03_u:521: tadyajñenaivaitadyajñaṃ sambhṛtya yajñe yajñam pratiṣṭhāpayati yajñena yajñaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:522: saṃtanoti saṃtataṃ hyevāsyaitadvratam bhavatyā sutyāyai triṣkṛtva āha trivṛddhi
GV03sb_03_u:525: athāgnimabhyāvṛtya vācaṃ visṛjate | na ha sa yajñamāpyāyayati na saṃdadhāti yo 'to
GV03sb_03_u:526: 'nyena vācaṃ visṛjate sa prathamaṃ vyāharantsatyaṃ vāco 'bhivyāharati
GV03sb_03_u:528: agnirbrahmeti | agnirhyeva brahmāgniryajña ityagnirhyeva yajño vanaspatiryajñiya
GV03sb_03_u:529: iti vanaspatayo hi yajñiyā na hi manuṣyā yajeranyadvanaspatayo na syustasmādāha
GV03sb_03_u:532: athāsmai vrataṃ śrapayanti | devānvā eṣa upāvartate yo dīkṣate sa devatānāmeko
GV03sb_03_u:533: bhavati śṛtaṃ vai devānāṃ havirnāśṛtaṃ tasmācrapayanti tadeṣa eva vratayati nāgnau
GV03sb_03_u:534: juhoti tadyadeṣa eva vratayati nāgnau juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:536: yajñena vai devāḥ | imāṃ jitiṃ jigyuryaiṣāmiyaṃ jitiste hocuḥ kathaṃ na idam
GV03sb_03_u:537: manuṣyairanabhyārohyaṃ syāditi te yajñasya rasaṃ dhītvā yathā madhu madhukṛto
GV03sb_03_u:541: tadvā ṛṣīṇāmanuśrutamāsa | te yajñaṃ samabharanyathāyaṃ yajñaḥ sambhṛta eṣa vā
GV03sb_03_u:542: atra yajño bhavati yo dīkṣata eṣa hyenaṃ tanuta eṣa enaṃ janayati tadyadevātra
GV03sb_03_u:543: yajñasya nirdhītaṃ yadvidugdhaṃ tadevaitatpunarāpyāyayati yadeṣa eva vratayati
GV03sb_03_u:544: nāgnau juhoti na hāpyāyayedyadagnau juhuyājjuhvadu haiva manyeta nājuhvat
GV03sb_03_u:546: ime vai prāṇāḥ | manojātā manoyujo dakṣakratavo vāgevāgniḥ prāṇodānau
GV03sb_03_u:547: mitrāvaruṇau cakṣurādityaḥ śrotraṃ viśve devā etāsu haivāsyaitaddevatāsu hutam
GV03sb_03_u:550: taddhaike | prathame vrata ubhau vrīhiyavāvāvapantyubhābhyāṃ rasābhyāṃ yadevātra
GV03sb_03_u:551: yajñasya nirdhītaṃ yadvidugdhaṃ tatpunarāpyāyayāma iti vadanto yadyu vratadughā
GV03sb_03_u:552: na duhīta yasyaivātaḥ kāmayeta tasya vrataṃ kuryādetadu hyevāsyaitā ubhau
GV03sb_03_u:553: vrīhiyavāvanvārabdhau bhavata iti tadu tathā na kuryānna ha sa yajñamāpyāyayati
GV03sb_03_u:554: na saṃdadhāti ya ubhau vrīhiyavāvāvapati tasmādanyataramevāvapeddhavirvā asyaitā
GV03sb_03_u:556: au vrīhiyavau bhavataḥ sa yadevāsyaitau havirbhavatastadevāsyaitāvanvārabdhau
GV03sb_03_u:557: bhavato yadyu vratadughā na duhīta yasyaivātaḥ kāmayeta tasya vrataṃ kuryāt
GV03sb_03_u:559: taddhaike | prathame vrate sarvauṣadhaṃ sarvasurabhyāvapanti yadi
GV03sb_03_u:560: dīkṣitamārtirvindedyenaivātaḥ kāmayeta tena bhiṣajyedyathā vratena bhiṣajyediti
GV03sb_03_u:561: tadu tathā na kuryānmānuṣaṃ ha te yajñe kurvanti vyṛddhaṃ vai tadyajñasya
GV03sb_03_u:562: yanmānuṣaṃ nedvyṛddhaṃ yajñe karavāṇīti yadi dīkṣitamārtirvindedyenaivātaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:565: athāsmai vratam prayacati | atinīya mānuṣaṃ kālaṃ sāyaṃdugdhamapararātre
GV03sb_03_u:566: prātardugdhamaparāhṇe vyākṛtyā eva daivaṃ caivaitanmānuṣaṃ ca vyākaroti

GV03sb_03_u:848: atha sphyamādāya parilikhati | vajro vai sphyo vajreṇaivaitatparilikhati triṣkṛtvaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:851: sa parilikhati | asme ramasveti yajamāne ramasvetyevaitadāhātha samullikhya padaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:852: sthālyāṃ saṃvapatyasme te bandhuriti yajamāne te bandhurityevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:854: athāpa upaninayati | yatra vā asyai khanantaḥ krūrīkurvantyapaghnanti
GV03sb_03_u:855: śāntirāpastadadbhiḥ śāntyā śamayati tadadbhiḥ saṃdadhāti tasmādapa upaninayati
GV03sb_03_u:857: atha yajamānāya padaṃ prayacati | tve rāya iti paśavo vai rāyastvayi paśava
GV03sb_03_u:858: ityevaitadāha tadyajamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti me rāya iti paśavo vai rāyo mayi paśava
GV03sb_03_u:861: athādhvaryurātmānamupaspṛśati | mā vayaṃ rāyaspoṣeṇa viyauṣmeti tatho
GV03sb_03_u:864: atha patnyai padam pratiparāharanti | gṛhā vai patnyai pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_03_u:868: tāṃ neṣṭā vācayati | toto rāya ityathaināṃ somakrayaṇyā saṃkhyāpayati vṛṣā vai somo
GV03sb_03_u:869: yoṣā patnyeṣa vā atra somo bhavati yatsomakrayaṇī mithunamevaitatprajananaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:872: sa saṃkhyāpayati | samakhye devyā dhiyā saṃ dakṣiṇayorucakṣasā mā ma āyuḥ
GV03sb_03_u:873: pramoṣīrmo ahaṃ tava vīraṃ videya tava devi saṃdṛśītyāśiṣamevaitadāśāste putro
GV03sb_03_u:874: vai vīraḥ putraṃ videya tava saṃdṛśītyevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:876: sā yā babhruḥ piṅgākṣī | sā somakrayaṇī yatra vā indrāviṣṇū tredhā sahasraṃ
GV03sb_03_u:877: vyairayetāṃ tadekātyaricyata tāṃ tredhā prājanayatāṃ tasmādyo 'pyetarhi tredhā
GV03sb_03_u:880: sā yā babhruḥ piṅgākṣī | sā somakrayaṇyatha yā rohiṇī sā vārtraghnī yāmidaṃ rājā
GV03sb_03_u:881: saṃgrāmaṃ jitvodākurute 'tha yā rohiṇī śyetākṣī sā pitṛdevatyā yāmidam pitṛbhyo
GV03sb_03_u:884: sā yā babhruḥ piṅgākṣī | sā somakrayaṇī syādyadi babhrum piṅgākṣīṃ na
GV03sb_03_u:885: vindedaruṇā syādyadyaruṇāṃ na vindedrohiṇī vārtraghnī syādrohiṇyai hatveva
GV03sb_03_u:888: sā syādapravītā | vāgvā eṣā nidāneta yatsomakrayaṇyayātayāmnī vā iyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:893: padaṃ samupya pāṇī avanenikte | tadyatpāṇī avanenikte vajro vā ājyaṃ retaḥ somo
GV03sb_03_u:894: nedvajreṇājyena retaḥ somaṃ hinasānīti tasmātpāṇī avanenikte
GV03sb_03_u:896: athāsyāṃ hiraṇyam badhnīte | dvayaṃ vā idaṃ na tṛtīyamasti satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ ca
GV03sb_03_u:897: satyamava devā anṛtam manuṣyā agniretasaṃ vai hiraṇyaṃ satyenāṃśūnupaspṛśāni
GV03sb_03_u:898: satyena somam parāhaṇānīti tasmādvā asyāṃ hiraṇyam badhnīte
GV03sb_03_u:901: yadeva śobhanaṃ tatsomopanahanaṃ syādvāso hyasyaitadbhavati śobhanaṃ hyetasya
GV03sb_03_u:902: vāsaḥ sa yo hainaṃ śobhanenopacarati śobhate hātha ya āha yadeva kiṃ ceti yaddhaiva
GV03sb_03_u:903: kiṃ ca bhavati tasmādyadeva śobhanaṃ tatsomopanahanaṃ syādyadeva kiṃ ca
GV03sb_03_u:906: yadyuṣṇīṣaṃ vindet | uṣṇīṣaḥ syādyadyuṣṇīṣaṃ na vindetsomaparyāṇahanasyaiva
GV03sb_03_u:907: dvyaṅgulaṃ vā tryaṅgulaṃ vāvakṛnteduṣṇīṣabhājanamadhvaryurvā yajamāno vā
GV03sb_03_u:910: athāgreṇa rājānaṃ vicinvanti | tadudakumbha upanihito bhavati tadbrāhmaṇa upāste
GV03sb_03_u:913: tadāyatsu vācayati | eṣa te gāyatro bhāga iti me somāya brūtādeṣa te traiṣṭubho
GV03sb_03_u:914: bhāga iti me somāya brūtādeṣa te jāgato bhāga iti me somāya brūtāccandonāmānāṃ

GV03sb_03_u:916: candasāmeva rājyāya candasāṃ sāmrājyāya ghnanti vā enametadyadabhiṣuṇvanti
GV03sb_03_u:917: tametadāha candasāmeva tvā rājyāya krīṇāmi candasāṃ sāmrājyāya na
GV03sb_03_u:920: so 'bhimṛśati | āsmāko 'sīti sva iva hyasyaitadbhavati yadāgatastasmādāhāsmāko 'sīti
GV03sb_03_u:921: śukraste grahya iti śukraṃ hyasmādgrahaṃ grahīṣyanbhavati vicitastvā vicinvantviti
GV03sb_03_u:924: atra haike | tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vāvittvāpāsyanti tadu tathā na kuryātkṣatraṃ vai somo
GV03sb_03_u:925: viḍanyā oṣadhayo 'nnaṃ vai kṣatriyasya viṭ sa yathā grasitamanuhāyācidya
GV03sb_03_u:926: parāsyedevaṃ tattasmādabhyeva mṛśedvicitastvā vicinvantviti tadya evāsya vicetārasta
GV03sb_03_u:929: atha vāsaḥ | dviguṇaṃ vā caturguṇaṃ vā prāgdaśaṃ vodagdaśaṃ vopastṛṇāti tadrājānam
GV03sb_03_u:930: mimīte sa yadrājānam mimīte tasmānmātrā manuṣyeṣu mātro yo cāpyanyā mātrā
GV03sb_03_u:932: sāvitryā mimīte | savitā vai devānām prasavitā tatho hāsmā eṣa savitṛprasūta eva
GV03sb_03_u:935: aticandasā mimīte | eṣā vai sarvāṇi candāṃsi yadaticandāstathā hāsyaiṣa sarvaireva
GV03sb_03_u:938: sa mimīte | abhi tyaṃ devaṃ savitāramoṇyoḥ kavikratumarcāmi satyasavaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:941: ūrdhvā yasyāmatirbhā adidyutatsavīmani hiraṇyapāṇiramimīta sukratuḥ kṛpā svariti
GV03sb_03_u:947: sa vā udācaṃ nyācam mimīte | sa yadudācaṃ nyācam mimīta imā
GV03sb_03_u:948: evaitadaṅgulīrnānājānāḥ karoti tasmādimā nānā jāyante 'tha yatsaha sarvābhirmimīte
GV03sb_03_u:949: saṃśliṣṭā iva haivaimā jāyeraṃstasmādvā udācaṃ nyācam mimīte
GV03sb_03_u:951: yadvevodācaṃ nyācam mimīte | imā evaitannānāvīryāḥ karoti tasmādimā
GV03sb_03_u:954: yadvevodācaṃ nyācam mimīte | virājamevaitadarvācīṃ ca parācīṃ ca yunakti
GV03sb_03_u:955: parācyaha devebhyo yajñaṃ vahatyarvācī manuṣyānavati tasmādvā udācaṃ nyācam
GV03sb_03_u:958: atha yaddaśa kṛtvo mimīte | daśākṣarā vai virāḍvairājaḥ somastasmāddaśa kṛtvo
GV03sb_03_u:961: atha somopanahanasya samutpāryāntān | uṣṇīṣeṇa vigrathnāti prajābhyastveti
GV03sb_03_u:962: prajābhyo hyenaṃ krīṇāti sa yadevedaṃ śiraścāṃsau cāntaropenitamiva
GV03sb_03_u:965: atha madhye 'ṅgulyākāśaṃ karoti | prajāstvānuprāṇantviti tamayatīva vā
GV03sb_03_u:966: enametatsamāyacannaprāṇamiva karoti tasyaitadata eva madhyataḥ prāṇamutsṛjati taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:967: tataḥ prāṇantam prajā anuprāṇanti tasmādāha prajāstvānuprāṇantviti taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:971: sa vai rājānam paṇate | sa yadrājānam paṇate tasmādidaṃ sakṛtsarvam paṇyaṃ sa āha
GV03sb_03_u:972: somavikrayinkrayyaste somo rājā3iti krayya ityāha somavikrayī taṃ vai te krīṇānīti
GV03sb_03_u:973: krīṇīhītyāha somavikrayī kalayā te krīṇānīti bhūyo vā ataḥ somo rājārhatītyāha
GV03sb_03_u:974: somavikrayī bhūya evātaḥ somo rājārhati mahāṃstveva gormahimetyadhvaryuḥ
GV03sb_03_u:976: gorvai pratidhuk | tasyai śṛtaṃ tasyai śarastasyai dadhi tasyai mastu tasyā ātañcanaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:977: tasyai navanītaṃ tasyai ghṛtaṃ tasyā āmikṣā tasyai vājinam
GV03sb_03_u:979: śaphena te krīṇānīti | bhūyo vā ataḥ somo rājārhatītyāha somavikrayī bhūya evātaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:981: vīryāṇyudākhyāyāha padā te 'rdhena te gavā te krīṇāmīti krītaḥ somo rājetyāha
GV03sb_03_u:984: sa āha | candra te vastraṃ te cāgā te dhenuste mithunau te gāvau tisraste 'nyā iti sa
GV03sb_03_u:985: yadarvākpaṇante paraḥ sampādayanti tasmādidaṃ sakṛtsarvam paṇyamarvākpaṇante
GV03sb_03_u:986: paraḥ sampādayantyatha yadadhvaryureva gorvīryāṇyudācaṣṭe na somasya
GV03sb_03_u:987: somavikrayī mahito vai somo devo hi somo 'thatadadhvaryurgām mahayati tasyai
GV03sb_03_u:988: paśyanvīryāṇi krīṇāditi tasmādadhvaryureva gorvīryāṇyudācaṣṭe na somasya
GV03sb_03_u:991: atha yatpañca kṛtvaḥ paṇate | saṃvatsarasammito vai yajñaḥ pañca vā ṛtavaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:992: saṃvatsarasya tam pañcabhirāpnoti tasmātpañca kṛtvaḥ paṇate
GV03sb_03_u:994: atha hiraṇye vācayati | śukraṃ tvā śukreṇa krīṇāmīti śukraṃ hyetacukreṇa krīṇāti
GV03sb_03_u:995: yatsomaṃ hiraṇyena candraṃ candreṇeti candraṃ hyetaccandreṇa krīṇāti yatsomaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:998: atha somavikrayiṇamabhiprakampayati | sagme te goriti yajamāne te
GV03sb_03_u:999: gaurityevaitadāha tadyajamānamabhyāhṛtya nyasthatyasme te candrāṇīti sa
GV03sb_03_u:1000: ātmanyeva vīryaṃ dhatte śarīrameva somavikrayī harate tattataḥ somavikrayyādatte
GV03sb_03_u:1002: athājāyām pratīcīnamukhyāṃ vācayati | tapasastanūrasīti tapaso ha vā eṣā prajāpateḥ

GV03sb_03_u:1005: saṃvatsarasya vijāyate tena paramaḥ paśuḥ sahasrapoṣam
GV03sb_03_u:1006: puṣeyamityāśiṣamevaitadāśāste bhūmā vai sahasram bhūmānaṃ gacānītyevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:1008: sa vā anenaivājām prayacati | anena rājānamādatta ājā ha vai nāmaiṣā yadajaitayā
GV03sb_03_u:1011: atha rājānamādatte | mitro na ehi sumitradha iti śivo naḥ śānta ehītyevaitadāha taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:1012: yajamānasya dakṣiṇa ūrau pratyuhya vāso nidadhātīndrasyorumāviśa
GV03sb_03_u:1014: dakṣiṇamityuśannuśantamiti priyaḥ priyamityevaitadāha syonaḥ syonamiti śivaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:1017: atha somakrayaṇānanudiśati | svāna bhrājāṅghare bambhāre hasta suhasta kṛśānavete
GV03sb_03_u:1018: vaḥ somakrayaṇāstānrakṣadhvam mā vo dabhanniti dhiṣṇyānāṃ vā ete bhājanenaitāni
GV03sb_03_u:1021: athātrāporṇute | garbho vā eṣa bhavati yo dīkṣate prāvṛtā vai garbhā ulveneva
GV03sb_03_u:1022: jarāyuṇeva tamatrājījanata tasmādaporṇuta eṣa vā atra garbho bhavati tasmātparivṛto
GV03sb_03_u:1023: bhavati parivṛtā iva hi garbho ulbeneva jarāyuṇeva
GV03sb_03_u:1025: atha vācayati | pari māgne duścaritādbādhasvā mā sucarite bhajetyāsīnaṃ vā enameṣa
GV03sb_03_u:1026: āgacati sa āgata uttiṣṭhati tanmithyākaroti vratam pramīṇāti tasyo haiṣā
GV03sb_03_u:1027: prāyaścittistatho hāsyaitanna mithyākṛtam bhavati na vratam pramīṇāti tasmādāha
GV03sb_03_u:1028: pari māgne duścaritādbādhasvā mā sucarite bhajeti
GV03sb_03_u:1030: atha rājānamādāyottiṣṭhati | udāyuṣā svāyuṣodasthāmamṛtāṃ anvityamṛtaṃ vā eṣo
GV03sb_03_u:1031: 'nuttiṣṭhāta yaḥ somaṃ krītaṃ tasmādāhodāyuṣā svāyuṣodasthāmamṛtāṃ anviti
GV03sb_03_u:1033: atha rājānamādāyārohaṇamabhipraiti | prati panthāmapadmahi svasti gāmanehasam

GV03sb_03_u:1037: etadyajuḥ svastyayanaṃ dadṛśusta etena yajuṣā nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyapahatyaitasya

GV03sb_03_u:1043: taṃ vā iti haranti | anasā parivahanti mahayantyevainametattasmācīrṣṇā vījaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:1046: atha yadapāmante krīṇāti | raso vā āpaḥ sarasamevaitatkrīṇātyatha yaddhiraṇyam
GV03sb_03_u:1049: sāśiramevaitatkrīṇātyatha yanmithunau bhavataḥ samithunamevaitatkrīṇāti taṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:1055: bandhurathainamāsādayatyadityai sada āsīdetīyaṃ vai pṛthivyaditiḥ seyam pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_03_u:1058: athaivamabhipadya vācayati | astabhnāddyāṃ vṛṣabho antarikṣamiti devā ha vai
GV03sb_03_u:1062: amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyā iti | tadenenemāṃlokānāspṛṇoti tasya hi na hantāsti na
GV03sb_03_u:1063: badho yeneme lokā āspṛtāstasmādāhāmimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyā iti
GV03sb_03_u:1065: āsīdadviśvā bhuvanāni samrāḍiti | tadenenedaṃ sarvamāspṛṇoti tasya hi na hantāsti

GV03sb_03_u:1068: viśvettāni varuṇasya vratānīti tadasmā idaṃ sarvamanuvartma karoti yadidaṃ kiṃ ca
GV03sb_03_u:1069: na kaṃ cana pratyudyāminaṃ tasmādāha viśvettāni varuṇasya vratānīti
GV03sb_03_u:1071: atha somaparyāṇahanena paryāṇahyati | nedenaṃ nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi pramṛśāniti garbho
GV03sb_03_u:1072: vā eṣa bhavati tira iva vai garbhāstira ivaitatparyāṇaddhaṃ tira iva vai devā
GV03sb_03_u:1075: sa paryāṇahyati | vaneṣu vyantarikṣaṃ tatāneti vaneṣu hīdamantarikṣaṃ vitataṃ
GV03sb_03_u:1076: vṛkṣāgreṣu vājamarvatsu paya usriyāsviti vīryaṃ vai vājāḥ pumāṃso 'rvantaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:1077: puṃsvevaitadvīryaṃ dadhāti paya usriyāsviti payo hīdamusriyāsu hitaṃ hṛtsu kratuṃ
GV03sb_03_u:1078: varuṇo vikṣvagnimiti hṛtsu hyayaṃ kraturmanojavaḥ praviṣṭo vikṣvagnimiti vikṣu
GV03sb_03_u:1079: hyayam prajāsvagnirdivi sūryamadadhātsomamadrāviti divi hyasau sūryo hitaḥ

GV03sb_03_u:1082: atha yadi dve kṛṣṇājine bhavataḥ | tayoranyataratpratyānahyati pratīnāhabhājanaṃ

GV03sb_03_u:1088: uddhate pra ugye phalake bhavataḥ | tadantareṇa tiṣṭhantsubrahmaṇyaḥ prājati
GV03sb_03_u:1092: palāśaśākhayā prājati | yatra vai gāyatrī somamacāpatattadasyā āharantyā
GV03sb_03_u:1093: apādastābhyāyatya parṇam praciceda gāyatryai vā somasya vā rājñastatpatitvā parṇo
GV03sb_03_u:1097: athānaḍvāhāvājanti | tau yadi kṛṣṇau syātāmanyataro vā kṛṣṇastatra
GV03sb_03_u:1100: atha yunakti | usrāvetaṃ dhūrṣāhāvityusrau hi bhavato dhūrṣāhāviti dhūrvāhau hi
GV03sb_03_u:1101: bhavato yujyethāmanaśrū iti yujete hyanaśrū ityanārtāviti

GV03sb_03_u:1103: yajamānasya gṛhāngacatamiti yathaināvantarā nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi na
GV03sb_03_u:1106: atha paścātparikramya | apālambamabhipadyāha somāya krītāyānubrūhīti somāya
GV03sb_03_u:1109: atha vācayati | bhadro me 'si pracyavasva bhuvaspata iti bhadro hyasyaiṣa bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:1110: tasmānnānyamādriyate 'pyasya rājānaḥ sabhāgā āgacanti pūrvo rājño 'bhivadati
GV03sb_03_u:1111: bhadro hi bhavati tasmādāha bhadro me 'sīti pracyavasva bhuvaspata iti bhuvanānāṃ

GV03sb_03_u:1113: mā tvā paripariṇo vidanmā tvā paripanyino vidanmā tvā vṛkā aghāyavo vidanniti
GV03sb_03_u:1116: śyeno bhūtvā parāpateti | vaya evainametadbhūtam prapātayati yadvā ugraṃ
GV03sb_03_u:1118: yacyenastamevaitadbhūtam prapātayati yadāha śyeno bhūtvā parāpateti
GV03sb_03_u:1120: atha śarīramevānvavahanti | yajamānasya gṛhāngaca tannau saṃskṛtamiti nātra

GV03sb_03_u:2102: nimeṣamabhisaṃdhatto dīkṣātapasau haiva te āsatustamete gandharvāḥ somarakṣā
GV03sb_03_u:2105: tayoranyatarāṃ kuśīmāciceda | tāṃ devebhyaḥ pradadau sā dīkṣā tayā devā
GV03sb_03_u:2108: atha dvitīyāṃ kuśīmāciceda | tāṃ devebhyaḥ pradadau tattapastayā devāstapa
GV03sb_03_u:2111: khadireṇa ha somamācakhāda | tasmātkhadiro yadenenākhidattasmātkhādiro yūpo
GV03sb_03_u:2112: bhavati khādira sphyo 'cāvākasya hainaṃ gopanāyāṃ jahāra so 'cāvāko 'hīyata
GV03sb_03_u:2116: tasmāddīkṣitā rājānaṃ gopāyanti | nenno 'paharāniti tasmāttatra suguptaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2120: suguptaṃ cikīrṣedyasya ha gopanāyāmapaharanti hīyate ha tenaitena suparṇī
GV03sb_03_u:2121: devebhya ātmānaṃ nirakrīṇīta tasmādāhuḥ puṇyaloka ījāna iti
GV03sb_03_u:2123: ṛṇaṃ ha vai puruṣo jāyamāna eva | mṛtyorātmanā jāyate sayadyajate yathaiva
GV03sb_03_u:2124: tatsuparṇī devebhya ātmānaṃ nirakrīṇītaivamevaiṣa etanmṛtyorātmānaṃ niṣkrīṇīte
GV03sb_03_u:2126: tena devā ayajanta | tamete gandharvāḥ somarakṣā anvājagmuste
GV03sb_03_u:2127: 'nvāgatyābruvannanu no yajña ābhajata mā no yajñādantargātāstveva no 'pi yajñe
GV03sb_03_u:2130: te hocuḥ | kiṃ nastataḥ syāditi yathaivāsyāmutra goptāro 'bhūmaivamevāsyāpīha
GV03sb_03_u:2133: tatheti devā abruvan | somakrayaṇā va iti tānebhya
GV03sb_03_u:2135: saumyāpahṛto hi yuṣmatsomapīthastena somāhutiṃ nārhatheti saināneṣā
GV03sb_03_u:2136: tṛtīyasavana eva ghṛtyāhutiḥ prāpnoti na saumyā yacālākairdhiṣṇyānvyāghārayati
GV03sb_03_u:2138: atha yadagnau hoṣyanti | tadvo viṣyatīti sa yadagnau juhvati tadenānavatyatha
GV03sb_03_u:2139: yadvaḥ somam bibhrata uparyupari cariṣyanti tadvo viṣyatīti sa yadenāntsomam
GV03sb_03_u:2140: bibhrata uparyupari caranti tadenānavati tasmādadhvaryuḥ samayā
GV03sb_03_u:2141: dhiṣṇyānnātīyādadhvaryurhi somam bibharti tamete vyāttena pratyāsate sa eteṣāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2142: vyāttamāpadyeta tamagnirvābhidahedyo vāyaṃ devaḥ paśūnāmīṣṭe sa vā
GV03sb_03_u:2146: te vā ete | somasyaiva guptyai nyupyanta āhavanīyaḥ purastānmārjālīyo dakṣiṇata
GV03sb_03_u:2147: āgnīdhrīya uttarato 'tha ye sadasi te paścāt
GV03sb_03_u:2149: teṣāṃ vā ardhānupakiranti | ardhānanudiśantyeta u haivaitaddadhrire 'rdhānna
GV03sb_03_u:2150: upakirantvardhānanudiśantu tathā yasmāllokādāgatāḥ smo divastathā taṃ lokam
GV03sb_03_u:2153: sa yānupakiranti | tenāsmiṃloke pratyakṣam bhavantyatha yānanudiśanti
GV03sb_03_u:2156: te vai dvināmāno bhavanti | eta u haivaitaddadhrire na vā ebhirnāmabhirarātsma
GV03sb_03_u:2157: yeṣāṃ naḥ somamapāhārṣurhanti dvitīyāni nāmāni karavāmahā iti te dvitīyāni
GV03sb_03_u:2160: rādhnoti haiva ya evaṃ vidvāndvitīyaṃ nāma kurute
GV03sb_03_u:2162: sa yadagnau juhoti | taddeveṣu juhoti tasmāddevāḥ santyatha yatsadasi bhakṣayanti
GV03sb_03_u:2166: yā vai prajā yajñe 'nanvābhaktāḥ | parābhūtā vai tā evamevaitadyā imāḥ prajā
GV03sb_03_u:2167: aparābhūtāstā yajña ābhajati manuṣyānanu paśavo devānanu vayāṃsyoṣadhayo
GV03sb_03_u:2168: vanaspatayo yadidaṃ kiṃ caivamu tatsarvaṃ yajña ābhaktaṃ te ha smaita ubhaye
GV03sb_03_u:2169: devamanuṣyāḥ pitaraḥ sampibante saiṣā sampā te ha sma dṛśyamānā eva purā
GV03sb_03_u:2173: sarvaṃ vā eṣo 'bhi dīkṣate | yo dīkṣate yajñaṃ hyabhi dīkṣate yajñaṃ hyevedaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2174: sarvamanu taṃ yajñaṃ sambhṛtya yamimamabhi dīkṣate sarvamidaṃ visṛjate
GV03sb_03_u:2176: yadvaisarjināni juhoti | sa yadidaṃ sarvaṃ visṛjate tasmādvaisarjināni nāma tasmādyo
GV03sb_03_u:2177: 'pivrataḥ syātso 'nvārabheta yadyu anyatra carennādriyeta yadvai juhoti tadevedaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2180: yadveva vaisarjināni juhoti | yajño vai viṣṇuḥ sa devebhya imāṃ vikrāntiṃ vicakrame
GV03sb_03_u:2182: dvitīyena divamuttamenaitāmvevaiṣa etasmai viṣṇuryajño vikrāntiṃ vikramate
GV03sb_03_u:2185: so 'parāhṇe vediṃ stīrtvā | ardhavratam pradāya samprapadyanta
GV03sb_03_u:2187: sammārṣṭyupasthe rājānaṃ yajamānaḥ kurute 'tha somakrayaṇyai padaṃ jaghanena
GV03sb_03_u:2188: gārhapatyam parikirati padā vai pratitiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhityā eva
GV03sb_03_u:2194: tadu tathā na kuryāt | sārdhameva parikirejjaghanena gārhapatyamathotpūyājyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2195: caturgṛhīte juhvāṃ copabhṛti ca gṛhṇāti pañcagṛhītam pṛṣadājyaṃ jyotirasi
GV03sb_03_u:2196: viśvarūpaṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ vaiśvadevaṃ hi pṛṣadājyaṃ dhārayanti sruco yadā
GV03sb_03_u:2199: atha juhoti | tvaṃ soma tanūkṛdbhyo dveṣobhyo 'nyakṛtebhya uru yantāsi varūthaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2200: svāheti tadetenaivāsyām pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāyām pratitiṣṭhatyetenemaṃ lokaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2203: athāptave dvitīyāmāhutiṃ juhoti | juṣāṇo apturājyasya vetu svāhetyeṣa u
GV03sb_03_u:2204: haivaitaduvāca rakṣobhyo vai bibhemi yathā māntarā nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi na
GV03sb_03_u:2205: hinasannevam mā kanīyāṃsameva badhātkṛtvātinayata stokameva stoko hyapturiti
GV03sb_03_u:2210: somāyā praṇīyamānāyeti vāgnaye prahriyamāṇāyānubrūhīti tveva brūyāt
GV03sb_03_u:2213: prastaramaikṣavyau vidhṛtī tadbarhirupasaṃnaddham bhavati vapāśrapaṇyau raśane
GV03sb_03_u:2214: araṇī adhimanthanaḥ śakalo vṛṣaṇau tatsamādāya prāñca āyanti sa eṣa ūrdhvo yajña
GV03sb_03_u:2217: tadāyatsu vācayati | agne naya supathā rāya asmānviśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān
GV03sb_03_u:2223: sa nihite juhoti | ayaṃ no agnirvarivaskṛṇotvayam mṛdhaḥ pura etu prabhindan ayaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2230: prokṣaṇīradhvaryurādatte | sa idhmamevāgre prokṣatyatha vedimathāsmai barhiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2232: granthimāśvavālaḥ prastara upasaṃnaddho bhavati taṃ gṛhṇāti gṛhītvā
GV03sb_03_u:2236: atha juhoti | uru viṣṇo vikramasvoru kṣayāya naskṛdhi ghṛtaṃ ghṛtayone piba
GV03sb_03_u:2237: prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti tadetenaivaitasyāṃ divi pratiṣṭhāyām
GV03sb_03_u:2240: yadveva vaiṣṇavyarcā juhoti | kanīyāṃsaṃ vā enametadbadhātkṛtvātyanaiṣu
GV03sb_03_u:2241: stokameva stoko hyaptustametadabhayam prāpya ya evaiṣa taṃ karoti yajñameva
GV03sb_03_u:2244: athāsādya srucaḥ | apa upaspṛśya rājānam prapādayati tadyadāsādya sruco 'pa
GV03sb_03_u:2245: upaspṛśya rājānam prapādayati vajro vā ājyaṃ retaḥ somo nedvajreṇājyena retaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2246: somaṃ hinasānīti tasmādāsādya sruco 'pa upaspṛśya rājānam prapādayati
GV03sb_03_u:2248: sa dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya nīḍe kṛṣṇājinamāstṛṇāti | tadenamāsādayati deva
GV03sb_03_u:2249: savitareṣa te somastaṃ rakṣasva mā tvā dabhanniti tadenaṃ devāyaiva savitre
GV03sb_03_u:2252: athānusṛjyopatiṣṭhate | etattvaṃ deva soma devo devān upāgā idamaham
GV03sb_03_u:2253: manuṣyāntsaha rāyaspoṣeṇetyagnīṣomau vā etamantarjambha ādadhāte yo dīkṣata
GV03sb_03_u:2254: āgnāvaiṣṇavaṃ hyado dīkṣaṇīyaṃ havirbhavati yo vai viṣṇuḥ somaḥ sa havirvā eṣa
GV03sb_03_u:2255: devānām bhavati yo dīkṣate tadenamantarjambha ādadhāte tatpratyakṣaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2256: somānnirmucyate yadāhaitattvaṃ deva soma devo devān upāgā idamaham
GV03sb_03_u:2257: manuṣyāntsaha rāyaspoṣeṇeti bhūmā vai rāyaspoṣaḥ saha bhūmnetyevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:2259: athopaniṣkrāmati | svāhā nirvaruṇasya pāśānmucya iti varuṇapāśe vā eṣo
GV03sb_03_u:2263: athetyāhavanīye samidhamabhyādadhāti | agne vratapāstve vratapā ityagnirhi
GV03sb_03_u:2264: devānāṃ vratapatistasmādāhāgne vratapāstve vratapā iti yā tava tanūrmayyabhūdeṣā
GV03sb_03_u:2265: sā tvayi yo mama tanūstvayyabhūdiyaṃ sā mayi yathāyathaṃ nau vratapate vratānyanu
GV03sb_03_u:2267: sa svena satātmanā yajate tasmādasyātrāśnanti mānuṣo hi bhavati tasmādasyātra
GV03sb_03_u:2268: nāma gṛhṇanti mānuṣo hi bhavatyatha yatpurā nāśnanti yathā haviṣo hutasya
GV03sb_03_u:2272: yūpaṃ vrakṣyanvaiṣṇavyarcā juhoti | viṣṇavo hi yūpastasmādvaiṣṇavyarcā juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:2274: yadveva vaiṣṇavyā juhoti | yajño vai viṣṇuryajñenaivaitadyūpamacaiti
GV03sb_03_u:2277: sa yadi srucā juhoti | caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvā juhoti yadyu sruveṇa
GV03sb_03_u:2278: sruveṇaivopahatya juhotyuru viṣṇo vikramasvoru kṣayāya naskṛdhi ghṛtaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2279: ghṛtayone piba prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti
GV03sb_03_u:2281: yadājyam pariśiṣṭam bhavati | tadādatte yattakṣṇaḥ śastram bhavati tattakṣādatte ta
GV03sb_03_u:2284: tamevamabhimṛśya japati | paścādvaiva prāṅ tiṣṭhannabhimantrayate 'tyanyān agāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2285: nānyān upāgāmityati hyanyāneti nānyānupaiti tasmādāhātyanyān agāṃ nānyān
GV03sb_03_u:2288: arvāktvā parebhyo 'vidam paro 'varebhya iti | arvāgghyenam parebhyo vṛścati ya
GV03sb_03_u:2289: etasmānparāñco bhavanti paro 'varebhya iti paro hyenamavarebhyo vṛścati ya
GV03sb_03_u:2290: etasmādarvāñco bhavanti tasmādāhārvāktvā parebhyo 'vidam paro 'varebhya iti
GV03sb_03_u:2292: taṃ tvā juṣāmahe deva vanaspate devayajyāyā iti | tadyathā bahūnām
GV03sb_03_u:2293: madhyātsādhave karmaṇe juṣeta sa rātamanāstasmai karmaṇe
GV03sb_03_u:2294: syādevamevainametadbahūnām madhyātsādhave karmaṇe juṣate sa rātamanā
GV03sb_03_u:2297: devāstvā devayajyāyai juṣantāmiti | tadvai samṛddhaṃ yaṃ devāḥ sādhave karmaṇe
GV03sb_03_u:2300: atha sruveṇopaspṛśati | viṣṇave tveti vaiṣṇavo hi yūpo yajño vai viṣṇuryajñāya
GV03sb_03_u:2303: atha darbhataruṇakamantardadhāti | oṣadhe trāyasveti vajro vai paraśustatho
GV03sb_03_u:2304: hainameṣa vajraḥ paraśurna hinastyatha paraśunā praharati svadhite mainaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2305: hiṃsīriti vajro vai paraśustatho hainameṣa vajraḥ paraśurna hinasti
GV03sb_03_u:2307: sa yam prathamaṃ śakalamapacinatti | tamādatte taṃ vā anakṣastambhaṃ vṛśceduta
GV03sb_03_u:2310: tam prāñcam pātayet | prācī hi devānāṃ digatho udañcamudīcī hi manuṣyāṇāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2311: digatho pratyañcaṃ dakṣiṇāyai tvevainaṃ diśaḥ paribibādhiṣetaiṣā vai dik pitṝṇāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2314: tam pracyavamānamanumantrayate | dyām mā lekhīrantarikṣam mā hiṃsīḥ pṛthivyā
GV03sb_03_u:2315: sambhaveti vajro vā eṣa bhavati yaṃ yūpāya vṛścanti tasmādvajrātpracyavamānādime
GV03sb_03_u:2316: lokāḥ saṃrejante tadebhya evainametallokebhyaḥ śamayati tathemāṃlokāñcānto na
GV03sb_03_u:2319: sa yadāha | dyām mā lekhīriti divam mā hiṃsīrityevaitadāhāntarikṣam mā hiṃsīriti
GV03sb_03_u:2320: nātra tirohitamivāsti pṛthivyā sambhaveti pṛthivyā saṃjānīṣvetyevaitadāhāyaṃ hi tvā
GV03sb_03_u:2321: svadhitistetijānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāyetyeṣa hyenaṃ svadhitistejamānaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2324: athāvraścanamabhijuhoti | nedato nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyanūttiṣṭhāniti vajro vā ājyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2326: nānūttiṣṭhantyatho reto vā ājyaṃ tadvanaspatiṣvevaitadreto dadhāti tasmādretasa
GV03sb_03_u:2329: sa juhoti | atastvaṃ deva vanaspate śatavalśo viroha sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhemeti
GV03sb_03_u:2334: pañcāratnim parivāsayet | pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pañcartavaḥ saṃvatsarasya
GV03sb_03_u:2337: ṣaḍaratnim parivāsayet | ṣaḍvā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaro vajro vajro
GV03sb_03_u:2340: aṣṭāratnim parivāsayet | aṣṭākṣrā vai gāyatrī pūrvārdho vai yajñasya gāyatrī
GV03sb_03_u:2343: navāratnim parivāsayet | trivṛdvai yajño nava vai trivṛttasmānnavāratnim parivāsayet
GV03sb_03_u:2348: dvādaśāratnim parivāsayet | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaro vajro vajro
GV03sb_03_u:2351: trayodaśāratnim parivāsayet | trayodaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaro vajro
GV03sb_03_u:2354: pañcadaśāratnim parivāsayet | pañcadaśo vai vajro vajro yūpastasmātpañcadaśāratnim
GV03sb_03_u:2357: saptādaśāratnirvājapeyayūpaḥ | aparimita eva syādaparimitena vā etena vajreṇa devā
GV03sb_03_u:2361: sa vā aṣṭāśrirbhavati | aṣṭākṣarā vai gāyatrī pūrvārdho vai yajñasya gāyatrī
GV03sb_03_u:2365: abhrimādatte | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo
GV03sb_03_u:2366: hastābhyāmādade nāryasīti samāna etasya yajuṣo bandhuryoṣo vā eṣā
GV03sb_03_u:2369: athāvaṭam parilikhati | idamahaṃ rakṣasāṃ grīvā apikṛntāmīti vajro vā
GV03sb_03_u:2372: atha khanati | prāñcamutkaramutkiratyupareṇa sammāyāvaṭaṃ khanati tadagreṇa
GV03sb_03_u:2377: sa yavānāvapati | yavo 'si yavayāsmaddveṣo yavayārātīriti nātra tirohitamivāstyatha
GV03sb_03_u:2380: sa prokṣati | dive tvāntarikṣāya tvā pṛthivyai tveti vajro vai yūpa eṣāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2383: atha yāḥ prokṣaṇyaḥ pariśiṣyante | tā avaṭe 'vanayati śundhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛṣadanā
GV03sb_03_u:2384: iti pitṛdevatyo vai kūpaḥ khātastamevaitanmedhyaṃ karoti
GV03sb_03_u:2386: atha barhīṃṣi | prācīnāgrāṇi codīcīnāgrāṇi cāvastṛṇāti pitṛṣadanamasīti pitṛdevatyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2387: vā asyaitadbhavati yannikhātaṃ sa yathānikhāta oṣadhiṣu mitaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2390: atha yūpaśakalam prāsyati | tejo ha vā etadvanaspatīnāṃ yadbāhyāśakalastasmādyadā
GV03sb_03_u:2392: prāsyati satejasam minavānīti tadyadeṣa eva bhavati nānya eṣa hi yajuṣkṛto
GV03sb_03_u:2395: sa prasyati | agreṇīrasi svāveśa unnetṝṇāmiti purastādvā asmādeṣo 'pacidyate
GV03sb_03_u:2396: tasmādāhāgreṇīrasi svāveśa unnetṝṇāmityetasya vittādadhi tvā sthāsyatītyadhi hyenaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2400: rakṣāṃsyupottiṣṭhāniti vajro vā ājyaṃ tadvajreṇaivaitannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyavabādhate
GV03sb_03_u:2404: so 'nakti | devastvā savitā madhvānaktviti savitā vai devānām prasavitā yajamāno vā
GV03sb_03_u:2405: eṣa nidānena yadyūpaḥ sarvaṃ vā idam madhu yadidaṃ kiṃ ca tadenamanena sarveṇa
GV03sb_03_u:2406: saṃsparśayati tadasmai savitā prasavitā prasauti tasmādāha devastvā savitā
GV03sb_03_u:2409: atha caṣālamubhayataḥ pratyajya pratimuñcati | supippalābhyastvauṣadhībhya iti
GV03sb_03_u:2410: pippalaṃ haivāsyaitadyanmadhye saṃgṛhītamiva bhavati tiryagvā idaṃ vṛkṣe
GV03sb_03_u:2411: pippalamāhataṃ sa yadevedaṃ sambandhanaṃ cāntaropenitamiva tadevaitatkaroti
GV03sb_03_u:2414: āntamagniṣṭhāmanakti | yajamāno vā agniṣṭhā rasa ājyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2418: sa ucriyati | dyāmagreṇāspṛkṣa āntarikṣam madhyenāprāḥ pṛthivīmupareṇādṛṃhīriti
GV03sb_03_u:2419: vajro vai yūpa eṣāṃ lokānāmabhijityai tena vajreṇemāṃlokāntspṛṇuta ebhyo lokebhyaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2422: atha minoti | yā te dhāmānyuśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgā ayāsaḥ atrāha
GV03sb_03_u:2423: tadurugāyasya viṣṇoḥ paramam padamavabhāri bhūrītyetayā triṣṭubhā minoti
GV03sb_03_u:2426: sampratyagnimagniṣṭām minoti | yajamāno vā agniṣṭhāgniru vai yajñaḥ sa
GV03sb_03_u:2431: athaivamabhipadya vācayati | viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe indrasya
GV03sb_03_u:2432: yujyuḥ sakheti vajraṃ vā eṣa prāhārṣīdyo yūpamudaśiśriyadviṣṇorvijitim
GV03sb_03_u:2433: paśyatetyevaitadāha yadāha viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paśpaśe indrasya
GV03sb_03_u:2434: yujyaḥ sakhetīndro vai yajñasya devatā vaiṣṇavo yūpastaṃ sendraṃ karoti
GV03sb_03_u:2437: atha caṣālamudīkṣate | tadviṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ divīva
GV03sb_03_u:2438: cakṣurātatamiti vajraṃ vā eṣa prāhārṣīdyo yūpamudaśiśriyattā viṣṇorvijitim
GV03sb_03_u:2439: paśyatetyevaitadāha yadāha tadviṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ divīva
GV03sb_03_u:2442: atha parivyayati | anagnatāyai nveva parivyayati tasmādatreva parivyayatyatreva
GV03sb_03_u:2446: trivṛtā parivyayati | trivṛddhyannam paśavo hyannam pitā mātā yajjāyate tattṛtīyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2449: sa parivyayati | parivīrasi pari tvā daivīrviśo vyayantām parīmaṃ yajamānaṃ rāyo
GV03sb_03_u:2450: manuṣyāṇāmiti tadyajamānāyāśiṣamāśāste yadāha parīmaṃ yajamānaṃ rāyo
GV03sb_03_u:2453: atha yūpaśakalamavagūhati | divaḥ sūnurasīti prajā haivāsyaiṣā tasmādyadi
GV03sb_03_u:2454: yūpaikādaśinī syātsvaṃ svamevāvagūhedaviparyāsaṃ tasya haiṣāmugdhānuvratā prajā
GV03sb_03_u:2455: jāyate 'tha yo viparyāsamavagūhati na svaṃsvaṃ tasya haiṣā mugdhānanuvratā prajā
GV03sb_03_u:2458: svargasyo haiṣa lokasya samārohaṇaḥ kriyate | yadyūpaśakala iyaṃ raśanā raśanāyai
GV03sb_03_u:2464: tasya yannikhātam | tena pitṛlokaṃ jayatyatha yadūrdhvaṃ nikhātādā raśanāyai tena
GV03sb_03_u:2465: manuṣyalokaṃ jayatyatha yadūrdhvaṃ raśanāyā ā caṣālāttena devalokaṃ jayatyatha
GV03sb_03_u:2466: yadūrdhvaṃ caṣālāddvyaṅgulaṃ vā tryaṅgulaṃ vā sādhyā iti devāstena teṣāṃ lokaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2467: jayati saloko vai sādhyairdevairbhavati ya evametadveda
GV03sb_03_u:2469: taṃ vai pūrvārdhe minoti | vajro vai yūpo vajro daṇḍaḥ pūrvārdhaṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:2470: daṇḍasyābhipadya praharati pūrvārdha eṣa yajñasya tasmātpūrvārdhe minoti
GV03sb_03_u:2472: yajñena vai devāḥ | imāṃ jitiṃ jigyuryaiṣāmiyaṃ jitiste hocuḥ kathaṃ na idam
GV03sb_03_u:2473: manuṣyairanabhyārohyaṃ syāditi te yajñasya rasaṃ dhītvā yathā madhu madhukṛto
GV03sb_03_u:2478: sa vā aṣṭāśrirbhavati | aṣṭākṣarā vai gāyatrī pūrvārdho vai yajñasya gāyatrī
GV03sb_03_u:2481: taṃ ha smaitaṃ devā anupraharanti | yathedamapyetarhyeke 'nupraharantīti devā
GV03sb_03_u:2484: te devā adhvaryumabruvan | yūpaśakalameva juhudhi tadahaiṣa svagākṛto
GV03sb_03_u:2485: bhaviṣyati tatho rakṣāṃsi yajñaṃ nānūtpāsyante 'yaṃ vai vajra udyata iti
GV03sb_03_u:2487: so 'dhvaryuḥ | yūpaśakalamevājuhottadahaiṣa svagākṛta āsīttatho rakṣāṃsi yajñaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2490: tatho evaiṣa etat | yūpaśakalameva juhoti tadahaiṣa svagākṛto bhavati tatho
GV03sb_03_u:2491: rakṣāṃsi yajñaṃ nānūtpibante 'yaṃ vai vajra udyata iti sa juhoti divaṃ te dhūmo
GV03sb_03_u:2495: yāvato vai vedistāvatī pṛthivī | vajrā vai yūpāstadimāmevaitatpṛthivīmetairvajraiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2496: spṛṇute 'syai sapatnānnirbhajati tasmādyūpaikādaśinī bhavati dvādaśa upaśayo
GV03sb_03_u:2497: bhavati vitaṣṭastaṃ dakṣiṇata upanidadhāti tadyaddvādaśa upaśayo bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2499: devā ha vai yajñaṃ tanvānāḥ | te 'surarakṣasebhya āsaṅgādbibhayāṃ cakrustadya eta
GV03sb_03_u:2500: ucritā yatheṣurastā tayā vai stṛṇute vā na vā stṛṇute yathā daṇḍaḥ prahṛtastena vai
GV03sb_03_u:2501: stṛṇute vā na vā stṛṇute 'tha ya eṣa dvādaśa upaśayo bhavati yatheṣurāyatānastā
GV03sb_03_u:2505: taṃ nidadhāti | eṣa te pṛthivyāṃ loka āraṇyaste paśuriti paśuśca vai yūpaśca tadasmā
GV03sb_03_u:2506: āraṇyameva paśūnāmanudiśati teno eṣa paśumānbhavati tadvayaṃ yūpaikādaśinyai
GV03sb_03_u:2507: sammayanamāhuḥ śvaḥsutyāyai ha nvevaike samminvanti prakubratāyai caiva
GV03sb_03_u:2510: tadu tathā na kuryāt | agniṣṭhamevocrayedidaṃ vai yūpamucrityādhvaryurā
GV03sb_03_u:2511: parivyayaṇānnānvarjatyaparivītā vā eta etāṃ rātriṃ vasanti sā nveva paricakṣā paśave
GV03sb_03_u:2512: vai yūpamucrayanti prātarvai paśūnālabhante tasmādu prātarevocrayet
GV03sb_03_u:2514: sa ya uttaro 'gniṣṭhātsyāt | tamevāgra ucrayedatha dakṣiṇamathottaraṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2520: sa yo varṣiṣṭhaḥ sa dakṣiṇārdhyaḥ syāt | atha hrasīyānatha hrasīyānuttarārdhyo
GV03sb_03_u:2523: atha patnībhyaḥ patnīyūpamucrayanti | sarvatvāya nveva patnīyūpa ucrāyate
GV03sb_03_u:2524: tattvāṣṭram paśumālabhate tvaṣṭā vai siktaṃ reto vikaroti tadeṣa evaitatsiktaṃ reto
GV03sb_03_u:2525: vikaroti muṣkaro bhavatyeṣa vai prajanayitā yanmuṣkarastasmānmuṣkaro bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2530: paśuśca vai yūpaśca | na vā ṛte yūpātpaśumālabhante kadā cana tadyattathā na ha vā
GV03sb_03_u:2531: etasmā agre paśavaścakṣamire yadannamabhiviṣyanyathedamannam bhūtā yathā
GV03sb_03_u:2532: haivāyaṃ dvipātpuruṣa ucrita evaṃ haiva dvipāda ucritāśceruḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2534: tato devā etaṃ vajraṃ dadṛśuḥ | yadyūpaṃ tamuciśriyustasmādbhīṣā prāvlīyanta
GV03sb_03_u:2535: tataścatuṣpādā abhavaṃstato 'nnamabhavanyathedamannam bhūtā etasmai hi vā ete
GV03sb_03_u:2536: 'tiṣṭhanta tasmādyūpa eva paśumālabhante narte yūpātkadā cana
GV03sb_03_u:2538: athopākṛtya paśum | agnim mathitvā niyunakti tadyattathā na ha vā etasmā agre
GV03sb_03_u:2542: te hocuḥ | na vā ime 'sya yāmaṃ viduryadagnau havirjuhvati naitām
GV03sb_03_u:2544: vediṣyantyeṣa vai kila haviṣo yāma eṣā pratiṣṭhāgnau vai kila havirjuhvatīti tato
GV03sb_03_u:2547: ta uparudhyaiva paśūn | agnim mathitvāgnāvagnimajuhuvuste 'vidureṣa vai kila
GV03sb_03_u:2548: haviṣo yāma eṣā pratiṣṭhāgnau vai kila havirjuhvatīti tato 'bhyavāyaṃstato
GV03sb_03_u:2551: tatho evaiṣa etat | uparudhyaiva paśumagnim mathitvāgnāvagniṃ juhoti sa vedaiṣa
GV03sb_03_u:2552: vai kila haviṣo yāma eṣā pratiṣṭhāgnau vai kila havirjuhvatīti tato 'bhyavaiti tato
GV03sb_03_u:2553: rātamanā ālambhāya bhavati tasmādupākṛtya paśumagnim mathitvā niyunakti
GV03sb_03_u:2556: niyuñjyāditi tadu tathā na kuryādyathādharmaṃ tiraścathā cikīrṣedevaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2559: atha tṛṇamādāyopākaroti | dvitīyavānniruṇadhā iti dvitīyavānhi vīryavān
GV03sb_03_u:2561: sa tṛṇamādatte | upāvīrasītyupa hi dvitīyo 'vati tasmādāhopāvīrasītyupa
GV03sb_03_u:2562: devāndaivīrviśaḥ prāguriti daivyo vā etā viśo yatpaśavo 'sthiṣata devebhya
GV03sb_03_u:2565: uśijo vahnitamāniti | vidvāṃso hi devāstasmādāhośijo vahnitamāniti
GV03sb_03_u:2567: deva tvaṣṭarvasu rameti | tvaṣṭā vai paśūnāmīṣṭe paśavo vasu tānetaddevā
GV03sb_03_u:2570: havyā te svadantāmiti | yadā vā eta etasmā adhriyanta
GV03sb_03_u:2573: revatī ramadhvamiti | revanto hi paśavastasmādāha revatī ramadhvamiti bṛhaspate
GV03sb_03_u:2574: dhārayā vasūnīti brahma vai bṛhaspatiḥ paśavo vasu tānetaddevā
GV03sb_03_u:2576: etadbrahmaṇaiva parastātparidadhāti tannātiyanti tasmādāha bṛhaspate dhārayā
GV03sb_03_u:2580: pāśaṃ kṛtvā pratimuñcati | ṛtasya tvā devahaviḥ pāśena pratimuñcāmīti varuṇyā vā
GV03sb_03_u:2581: eṣā yadrajjustadenametadṛtasyaiva pāśe pratimuñcati tatho hainameṣā varuṇyā
GV03sb_03_u:2584: dharṣā mānuṣa iti | na vā etamagre manuṣyo 'dhṛṣṇotsa yadevartasya
GV03sb_03_u:2585: pāśenaitaddevahaviḥ pratimuñcatyathainam manuṣyo dhṛṣṇoti tasmādāha dharṣā
GV03sb_03_u:2588: atha niyunakti | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo
GV03sb_03_u:2593: sa prokṣati | adbhyastvauṣadhībhya iti tadyata eva sambhavati tata evaitanmedhyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2594: karotīdaṃ hi yadā varṣatyathauṣadhayo jāyanta oṣadhīrjagdhvāpaḥ pītvā tata eṣa
GV03sb_03_u:2595: rasaḥ sambhavati rasādreto retasaḥ paśavastadyata eva sambhavati yataśca jāyate tata
GV03sb_03_u:2598: anu tvā mātā manyatāmanu piteti | sa hi mātuścādhi pituśca jāyate tadyata eva jāyate
GV03sb_03_u:2599: tata evaitanmedhyaṃ karotyanu bhrātā sagarbhyo 'nu sakhā sayūthya iti sa yatte
GV03sb_03_u:2600: janma tena tvānumatamārabha ityevaitadāhāgnīṣomābhyāṃ tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmīti
GV03sb_03_u:2604: karotyathādhastādupokṣatyāpo devīḥ svadantu svāttaṃ citsaddevahaviriti tadenaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2608: uttaramāghāramāghāryāsaṃsparśayantsrucau paryetya juhvā paśuṃ samanakti śiro vai
GV03sb_03_u:2609: yajñasyottara āghāra eṣa vā atra yajño bhavati yatpaśustadyajña evaitaciraḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2612: sa lalāṭe samanakti | saṃ te prāṇo vātena gacatāmiti samaṅgāni yajatrairityaṃsayoḥ saṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2613: yajñapatirāśiṣeti śroṇyoḥ sa yasmai kāmāya paśumālabhante tatprāpnuhītyevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:2615: idaṃ vai paśoḥ saṃjñapyamānasya | prāṇo vātamapipadyate tatprāpnuhi yatte prāṇo
GV03sb_03_u:2616: vātamapipadyātā ityevaitadāha samaṅgāni yajatrairityaṅgairvā asya yajante
GV03sb_03_u:2617: tatprāpnuhi yatte 'ṅgairyajāntā ityevaitadāha sa yajñapatirāśiṣeti yajamānasya vā
GV03sb_03_u:2621: atha dvitīyamāśrāvayati | dvau hyatra hotārau bhavataḥ sa
GV03sb_03_u:2622: maitrāvaruṇāyāhaivāśrāvayati yajamānaṃ tveva pravṛṇīte 'gnirha daivīnāṃ viśām
GV03sb_03_u:2623: puraetetyagnirhi devatānām mukhaṃ tasmādāhāgnirha daivīnāṃ viśām puraetetyayaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2624: yajamāno manuṣyāṇāmiti taṃ hi so 'nvardho bhavati yasminnardhe yajate
GV03sb_03_u:2625: tasmādāhāyaṃ yajamāno manuṣyāṇāmiti tayorasthūri gārhapatyaṃ dīdayacataṃ himā
GV03sb_03_u:2626: dvā yū iti tayoranārtāni gārhapatyāni śataṃ varṣāṇi santvityevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:2628: rādhāṃsītsampṛñcānāvasampṛñcānau tanva iti | rādhāṃsyeva sampṛñcāthām nāpi
GV03sb_03_u:2629: tanūrityevaitadāha tau ha yattanūrapi sampṛñcīyātām prāgniryajamānaṃ dahetsa
GV03sb_03_u:2632: sampṛñcāte nāpi tanūstasmādāha rādhāṃsītsampṛñcānāvasampṛñcānau tanva iti
GV03sb_03_u:2635: tadyatraitatpravṛto hotā hotṛṣadana upaviśati | tadupaviśya prasauti prasūto
GV03sb_03_u:2638: athāprībhiścaranti | tadyadāprībhiścaranti sarveṇeva vā eṣa manasā sarveṇevātmanā
GV03sb_03_u:2639: yajñaṃ sambharati saṃ ca jihīrṣati yo dīkṣate tasya riricāna ivātmā bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2643: te vā eta ekādaśa prayājā bhavanti | daśa vā ime puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśo
GV03sb_03_u:2644: yasminnete prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitā etāvānvai puruṣastadasya sarvamātmānamāpyāyanti
GV03sb_03_u:2647: sa āśrāvyāha | samidhaḥ preṣyeti preṣya preṣyeti caturthecaturthe prayāje
GV03sb_03_u:2648: samānayamāno daśabhiḥ prayājaiścarati daśa prayājāniṣṭvāha śāsamāharetyasiṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:2651: atha yūpaśakalamādatte | tāvagre juhvā aktvā paśorlalāṭamupaspṛśati ghṛtenāktau
GV03sb_03_u:2652: paśūṃstrāyethāmiti vajro vai yūpaśakalo vajraḥ śāso vajra ājyaṃ tamevaitatkṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2653: vajraṃ sambhṛtya tamasyābhigoptāraṃ karoti nedenaṃ nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hinasanniti
GV03sb_03_u:2663: śrapayeyurāhavanīyo vā eṣa na vā eṣa tasmai yadasminnaśṛtaṃ śrapayeyustasmai vā
GV03sb_03_u:2666: tadu tathā na kuryāt | yathā vai grasitamevamasyaitadbhavati yadenena paryagniṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2667: karoti sa yathā grasitamanuhāyācidya tadanyasmai prayacedevaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2675: tadāhuḥ | naiṣa yajamānenānvārabhyo mṛtyave hyetaṃ nayanti tasmānnānvārabheteti
GV03sb_03_u:2676: tadanvevārabheta na vā etam mṛtyave nayanti yaṃ yajñāya nayanti
GV03sb_03_u:2682: atha stīrṇāyai vedeḥ | dve tṛṇe adhvaryurādatte sa āśrāvyāhopapreṣya hotarhavyā
GV03sb_03_u:2685: atha vācayati | revati yajamāna iti vāgvai revatī sā yadvāgbahu vadati tena vāgrevatī
GV03sb_03_u:2687: vātenetyantarikṣaṃ vā anu rakṣaścaratyamūlamubhayataḥ paricinnaṃ yathāyam
GV03sb_03_u:2691: asya haviṣastmanā yajeti | vācamevaitadāhānārtasyāsya haviṣa ātmanā yajeti samasya
GV03sb_03_u:2694: tadyatrainaṃ viśasanti | tatpurastāttṛṇamupāsyati varṣo varṣīyasi yajñe yajñapatiṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2695: dhā iti barhirevāsmā etatstṛṇātyaskannaṃ havirasaditi tadyadevāsyātra viśasyamānasya
GV03sb_03_u:2699: tasya na kūṭena praghnanti mānuṣaṃ hi tanno eva paścātkarṇam pitṛdevatyaṃ hi
GV03sb_03_u:2700: tadapigṛhya vaiva mukhaṃ tamayanti veṣkaṃ vā kurvanti tannāha jahi mārayeti
GV03sb_03_u:2701: mānuṣaṃ hi tatsaṃjñapayānvaganniti taddhi devatrā sa yadāhānvagannityetarhi
GV03sb_03_u:2704: tadyatrainaṃ nividhyanti | tatpurā saṃjñapanājjuhoti svāhā devebhya ityatha yadā
GV03sb_03_u:2705: prāha saṃjñaptaḥ paśurityatha juhoti devebhyaḥ svāheti purastātsvāhākṛtayo vā anye
GV03sb_03_u:2706: devā upariṣṭātsvāhākṛtayo 'nye tānevaitatprīṇāti ta enamubhaye devāḥ prītāḥ svargaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2707: lokamabhivahanti te vā ete paripaśavye ityāhutī sa yadi kāmayeta juhuyādete yadyu
GV03sb_03_u:2711: yadā prāha saṃjñaptaḥ paśuriti | athādhvaryurāha neṣṭaḥ patnīmudānayetyudānayati
GV03sb_03_u:2714: tāṃ vācayati | namasta ātāneti yajño vā ātāno yajñaṃ hi tanvate tena yajña ātāno
GV03sb_03_u:2715: jaghanārdho vā eṣa yajñasya yatpatnī tāmetatprācīṃ yajñam prasādayiṣyanbhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2716: tasmā evaitadyajñāya nihnute tatho haināmeṣa yajño na hinasti tasmādāha namasta
GV03sb_03_u:2719: anarvā prehīti | asapatnena prehītyevaitadāha ghṛtasya kulyā upa ṛtasya pathyā anviti
GV03sb_03_u:2720: sādhūpetyevaitadāha devīrāpaḥ śuddhā voḍhvaṃ supariviṣṭā deveṣu supariviṣṭā
GV03sb_03_u:2723: atha paśoḥ prāṇānadbhiḥ patnyupaspṛśati | tadyadadbhiḥ prāṇānupaspṛśati jīvaṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:2728: atha yatpatnyupaspṛśati | yoṣā vai patnī yoṣāyai vā imāḥ prajāḥ prajāyante
GV03sb_03_u:2731: sopaspṛśati | vācaṃ te śundhāmīti mukham prāṇaṃ te śundhāmīti nāsike cakṣuste
GV03sb_03_u:2732: śundhāmītyakṣyau śrotraṃ te śundhāmīti karṇau nābhiṃ te śundhāmīti yo
GV03sb_03_u:2733: 'yamaniruktaḥ prāṇo meḍhraṃ te śundhāmīti vā pāyuṃ te śundhāmīti yo 'yam
GV03sb_03_u:2735: padbhirvai pratitiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhityā eva tadenam pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_03_u:2737: atha yā āpaḥ pariśiṣyante | ardhā vā yāvatyo vā tābhirenaṃ yajamānaśca śīrṣato 'gre
GV03sb_03_u:2743: tāvanuṣiñcataḥ | manasta āpyāyatāṃ vākta āpyāyatām prāṇasta āpyāyatāṃ cakṣusta
GV03sb_03_u:2744: āpyāyatāṃ śrotraṃ ta āpyāyatāmiti tatprāṇāndhattastatsamīrayato yatte krūraṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2748: saṃdhattastatte śudhyatviti tanmedhyaṃ kurutaḥ śasahobhya iti jaghanena paśuṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2754: athottānam paśum paryasyanti | sa tṛṇamantardadhātyoṣadhe trāyasveti vajro vā
GV03sb_03_u:2755: asistatho hainameṣa vajro 'sirna hinastyathāsinābhinidadhāti svadhite mainaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2756: hiṃsīriti vajro vā asistatho hainameṣa vajro 'sirna hinasti
GV03sb_03_u:2758: sā yā prajñātāśriḥ | tayābhinidadhāti sā hi yajuṣkṛtā medhyā tadyadagraṃ tṛṇasya
GV03sb_03_u:2761: sa yatrācyati | yata etallohitamutpatati tadubhayato 'nakti rakṣasām bhāgo 'sīti
GV03sb_03_u:2771: atha vapāmutkhidanti | tayā vapāśrapaṇyau prorṇauti ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_03_u:2772: prorṇuvāthāmiti tadime dyāvāpṛthivī ūrjā rasena bhājayatyanayorūrjaṃ rasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_03_u:2773: te rasavatyā upajīvanīye imāḥ prajā upajīvanti
GV03sb_03_u:2775: kārṣmaryamayyau vapāśrapaṇyau bhavataḥ | yatra vai devā agre paśumālebhire
GV03sb_03_u:2776: tadudīcaḥ kṛṣyamāṇasyāvāṇnedhaḥ papāta sa eṣa vanaspatirajāyata
GV03sb_03_u:2778: samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti tasmātkārṣmaryamayyau vapāśrapaṇyau bhavataḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2780: tām parivāsayati | tām paśuśrapaṇe pratapati tatho hāsyātrāpi śṛtā bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2781: punarulmukamagnīdādatte te jaghanena cātvālaṃ yanti ta āyantyāgacantyāhavanīyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2782: sa etattṛṇamadhvaryurāhavanīye prāsyati vāyo vai stokānāmiti stokānāṃ haiṣā samit
GV03sb_03_u:2784: athottaratastiṣṭhanvapām pratapati | atyeṣyanvā eṣo 'gnim bhavati dakṣiṇataḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2785: parītya śrapayiṣyaṃstasmā evaitannihnute tatho hainameṣo 'tiyantamagnirna hinasti
GV03sb_03_u:2788: tāmantareṇa yūpaṃ cāgniṃ ca haranti | tadyatsamayā na haranti yenānyāni havīṃṣi
GV03sb_03_u:2789: haranti nedaśṛtayā samayā yajñam prasajāmeti yadu bāhyena na harantyagreṇa yūpam
GV03sb_03_u:2790: bahirdhā yajñātkuryustasmādantareṇa yūpaṃ cāgniṃ ca haranti dakṣiṇataḥ parītya
GV03sb_03_u:2793: atha sruveṇopahatyājyam | adhvaryurvapāmabhijuhotyagnirājyasya vetu svāheti tatho
GV03sb_03_u:2794: hāsyaite stokāḥ śṛtāḥ svāhākṛtā āhutayo bhūtvāgnim prāpnuvanti
GV03sb_03_u:2796: athāha stokebhyo 'nubrūhīti | sa āgneyī stokebhyo 'nvāha tadyadāgneyī stokebhyo
GV03sb_03_u:2797: 'nvāhetaḥpradānā vai vṛṣṭirito hyagnirvṛṣṭiṃ vanute sa etai stokairetāntstokānvanute
GV03sb_03_u:2798: ta ete stokā varṣanti tasmādāgneyī stokebhyo 'nvāha yadā śṛtā bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2803: hutvā vapāmevāgre 'bhighārayati | atha pṛṣadājyaṃ tadu ha carakādhvaryavaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2808: sa ha sma bāhū anvavekṣyāha | imau palitau bāhū kva svidbrāhmaṇasya vaco
GV03sb_03_u:2809: babhūveti na tadādriyetottamo vā eṣa prayājo bhavatīdaṃ vai haviryajña uttame
GV03sb_03_u:2810: prayāje dhruvāmevāgre 'bhighārayati tasyai hi prathamāvājyabhāgau hoṣyanbhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2811: vapāṃ vā atra prathamāṃ hoṣyanbhavati tasmādvapāmevāgre 'bhighārayedatha
GV03sb_03_u:2821: tadyaddhiraṇyaśakalāvabhito bhavataḥ | ghnanti vā etatpaśuṃ yadagnau
GV03sb_03_u:2822: juhvatyamṛtamāyurhiraṇyaṃ tadamṛta āyuṣi pratitiṣṭhati tathāta udeti tathā saṃjīvati
GV03sb_03_u:2823: tasmāddhiraṇyaśakalāvabhito bhavata āśrāvyāhāgnīṣomābhyāṃ cāgasya vapām medaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2824: preṣyeti na prasthitamityāha prasute prasthitamiti vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:2826: hutvā vapāṃ samīcyau | vapāśrapaṇyau kṛtvānuprāsyati svāhākṛte ūrdhvanabhasam
GV03sb_03_u:2827: mārutaṃ gacatamiti nedime amuyā sato yābhyāṃ vapāmaśiśrapāmeti
GV03sb_03_u:2829: tadyadvapayā caranti | yasyai vai devatāyai paśumālabhante tāmevaitaddevatāmetena
GV03sb_03_u:2830: medhena prīṇāti saiṣā devataitena medhena prītā śāntottarāṇi havīṃṣi
GV03sb_03_u:2833: atha cātvāle mārjayante | krūrī vā etatkurvanti yatsaṃjñapayanti yadviśāsati
GV03sb_03_u:2834: sāntirāpastadadbhiḥ śāntyā śamayante tadadbhiḥ saṃdadhate tasmāccātvāle mārjayante
GV03sb_03_u:2838: tadyatpuroḍāśamanunirvapati sarveṣāṃ vā eṣa paśūnām medho yadvrīhiyavau
GV03sb_03_u:2841: atha yadvapayā pracarya | etena puroḍāśena pracarati madhyato vā imāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2842: vapāmutkhidanti madhyata evainametena medhena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti
GV03sb_03_u:2843: tasmādvapayā pracaryaitena puroḍāśena pracaratyeṣa nvevaitasya bandhuryatra kva
GV03sb_03_u:2846: atha paśuṃ viśāsti | triḥ pracyāvayatāttriḥpracyutasya hṛdayamuttamaṃ kurutāditi
GV03sb_03_u:2849: atha śamitāraṃ saṃśāsti | yattvā pṛcācūtaṃ haviḥ śamitāriti śṛtamityeva brūtānna śṛtam
GV03sb_03_u:2852: atha juhvā pṛṣadājyasyopahatya | adhvaryurupaniṣkramya pṛcati śṛtaṃ haviḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2855: tadyatpṛcati | śṛtaṃ vai devānāṃ havirnāśṛtaṃ śamitā vai tadveda yadi śṛtaṃ vā
GV03sb_03_u:2858: tadyatpṛcati | śṛtena pracarāṇīti tadyadyaśṛtam bhavati śṛtameva devānāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2859: havirbhavati śṛtaṃ yajamānasyānenā adhvaryurbhavati śamitari tadeno bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:2860: triṣkṛtvaḥ pṛcati trivṛddhi yajño 'tha yadāha taddevānāmiti taddhi devānāṃ yacūtaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2863: sa hṛdayamevāgre 'bhighārayati | ātmā vai mano hṛdayam prāṇaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2867: so 'bhighārayati | saṃ te mano manasā sam prāṇaḥ prāṇena gacatāmiti na svāhākaroti
GV03sb_03_u:2870: taṃ jaghanena cātvālamantareṇa yūpaṃ cāgniṃ ca haranti | tadyatsamayā na haranti
GV03sb_03_u:2871: yenānyāni havīṃṣi haranti śṛtaṃ santaṃ nedaṅgaśo vikṛttena krūrīkṛtena samayā
GV03sb_03_u:2872: yajñam prasajāmeti yadu bāhyena na harantyagreṇa yūpam bahirdhā ha
GV03sb_03_u:2873: yajñātkuryustasmādantareṇa yūpaṃ cāgniṃ ca haranti dakṣiṇato nidhāya
GV03sb_03_u:2877: yatra vai devāḥ | agre paśumālebhire taṃ tvaṣṭā śīrṣato 'gre 'bhyuvāmotaivaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2878: cinnālabheranniti tvaṣṭurhi paśavaḥ sa eṣa śīrṣanmastiṣko 'nūkyaśca majjā
GV03sb_03_u:2882: tasyāvāṅ medhaḥ papāta | sa eṣa vanaspatirajāyata taṃ devāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2883: prāpaśyaṃstasmātprakhyaḥ prakhyo ha vai nāmaitadyatplakṣa iti
GV03sb_03_u:2887: athājyamupastṛṇīte | juhvāṃ copabhṛti ca vasāhomahavanyāṃ samavattadhānyāmatha
GV03sb_03_u:2890: atha manotāyai haviṣo 'nuvāca āha | tadyanmanotāyai haviṣo 'nuvāca āha sarvā ha
GV03sb_03_u:2891: vai devatāḥ paśumālabhyamānamupasaṃgacante mama nāma grahīṣyati mama nāma
GV03sb_03_u:2892: grahīṣyatīti sarvāsāṃ hi devatānāṃ haviḥ paśustāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ devatānām paśau
GV03sb_03_u:2893: manāṃsyotāni bhavanti tānyevaitatprīṇāti tatho hāmoghāya devatānām
GV03sb_03_u:2896: sa hṛdayasyaivāgre 'vadyati | tadyanmadhyataḥ sato hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati prāṇo vai
GV03sb_03_u:2897: hṛdayamato hyayamūrdhvaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃcarati prāṇo vai paśuryāvaddhyeva prāṇena
GV03sb_03_u:2898: prāṇiti tāvatpaśuratha yadāsmātprāṇo 'pakrāmati dārveva tarhi bhūto 'narthyaḥ śete
GV03sb_03_u:2900: hṛdayamu vai paśuḥ | tadasyātmana evāgre 'vadyati tasmādyadi kiṃcidavadānaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2901: hīyeta na tadādriyeta sarvasya haivāsya tatpaśoravattam bhavati yaddhṛdayasyāgre
GV03sb_03_u:2904: atha jihvāyai | sā hīyam pūrvārdhātpratiṣṭhatyatha vakṣasastaddhi tato
GV03sb_03_u:2907: gudaṃ tredhā karoti | sthavimopayaḍdbhyo madhyaṃ juhvāṃ dvedhā
GV03sb_03_u:2910: athopabhṛti | tryaṅgyasya doṣṇo gudaṃ dvedhā kṛtvāvadyati tryaṅgyāyai śroṇeratha
GV03sb_03_u:2913: atha vasāhomaṃ gṛhṇāti | reḍasīti lelayeva hi yūstasmādāha reḍasītyagniṣṭvā
GV03sb_03_u:2917: vātasya tvā dhrājyā iti | antarikṣaṃ vā ayamanupavate yo 'yam pavate 'ntarikṣāya vai
GV03sb_03_u:2918: gṛhṇāti tasmādāha vātasya tvā dhrājyā iti
GV03sb_03_u:2920: pūṣṇā raṃhyā iti | eṣa vai pūṣṇo raṃhiretasmā u hi gṛhṇāti tasmādāha pūṣṇo raṃhyā
GV03sb_03_u:2923: ūṣmaṇo vyathiṣaditi | eṣa vā ūṣmaitasmā u hi gṛhṇāte tasmādāhoṣmaṇo
GV03sb_03_u:2926: atha pārśvena vāsinā vā prayauti | prayuta dveṣa iti tannāṣṭrā evaitadrakṣāṃsyato
GV03sb_03_u:2929: atha yadyūṣpariśiṣyate | tatsamavattadhānyāmānayati taddhṛdayam prāsyati jihvāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2932: tadyaddhiraṇyaśakalāvabhito bhavataḥ | ghnanti vā etatpaśuṃ yadagnau
GV03sb_03_u:2933: juhvatyamṛtamāyurhiraṇyaṃ tadamṛta āyuṣi pratitiṣṭhati tathāta udeti tathā saṃjīvati
GV03sb_03_u:2936: atha yadakṣṇayāvadyati | savyasya ca doṣṇo dakṣiṇāyāśca ca doṣṇaḥ savyāvāśca
GV03sb_03_u:2937: śroṇestasmādayam paśurakṣṇayā pado haratyatha yatsamyagavadyetsamīco haivāyam
GV03sb_03_u:2941: amurā ha vā agre paśumālebhire | taddevā bhīṣā nopāveyustānheyam pṛthivyuvāca
GV03sb_03_u:2942: maitadādṛḍvamahaṃ va etasyādhyakṣā bhaviṣyāmi yathā yathaita etena cariṣyantīti
GV03sb_03_u:2944: sā hovāca | anyatarāmevāhutimahauṣuranyatarām paryaśiṣanniti sa yām
GV03sb_03_u:2952: antareṇārdharcau yājyāyai vasāhomaṃ juhoti | ito vā ayamūrdhvo medha utthito
GV03sb_03_u:2953: yamasyā imaṃ rasam prajā upajīvantyarvācīnaṃ divo raso vai vasāhomo raso medho
GV03sb_03_u:2954: rasenaivaitadrasaṃ tīvrīkaroti tasmādayaṃ raso 'dyamāno na kṣīyate
GV03sb_03_u:2956: tadyadantareṇa | ardharcau yājyāyai vasāhomaṃ juhotīyaṃ vā ardharco 'sau
GV03sb_03_u:2957: dyaurardharco 'ntarā vai dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣamantarikṣāya vai juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:2960: sa juhoti | ghṛtaṃ ghṛtapāvānaḥ pibata vasāṃ vasāpāvānaḥ pibatāntarikṣasya havirasi
GV03sb_03_u:2961: svāhetyetena vaiśvadevena yajuṣā juhoti vaiśvadevaṃ vā antarikṣaṃ tadyadenenemāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2962: prajāḥ prāṇatyaścodānatyaścāntarikṣamanucaranti tena vaiśvadevaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:2966: preṣyeti vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti tadyadvanaspataye juhotyetamevaitadvajraṃ yūpam
GV03sb_03_u:2967: bhāginaṃ karoti somo vai vanaspatiḥ paśumevaitatsomaṃ karoti tadyadantareṇobhe
GV03sb_03_u:2968: āhutī juhoti tayobhayaṃ vyāpnoti tasmādantareṇobhe āhutī juhoti
GV03sb_03_u:2970: atha yānyupabhṛtyavadānāni bhavanti | tāni samānayamāna āhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte
GV03sb_03_u:2973: atha yadvasāhomasya pariśiṣyate | tena diśo vyāghārayati diśaḥ pradiśa ādiśo vidiśa
GV03sb_03_u:2974: uddiśo digbhyaḥ svāheti raso vai vasāhomaḥ sarvāsvevaitaddikṣu rasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_03_u:2977: atha paśuṃ sammṛśati | etarhi sammarśanasya kālo 'tha yatpurā samṛśati ya ima
GV03sb_03_u:2978: upatiṣṭhante te vimathiṣyanta iti śaṅkamāno yadyu vimāthānna śaṅketātraiva
GV03sb_03_u:2981: aindraḥ prāṇaḥ | aṅge-aṅge nidīdhyadaindra udāno aṅge-aṅge nidhīta iti yadaṅgaśo
GV03sb_03_u:2982: vikṛtto bhavati tatprāṇodānābhyāṃ saṃdadhāti deva tvaṣṭarbhūri te saṃsametu
GV03sb_03_u:2983: salakṣmā yadviṣurūpam bhavātīti kṛtsnavṛtamevaitatkaroti devatrā yantamavase
GV03sb_03_u:2984: sakhāyo 'nu tvā mātāpitaro madantviti tadyatrainamahauṣīttadenaṃ kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:2988: trīṇi ha vai paśorekādaśāni | ekādaśa prayājā ekādaśānuyājā ekādaśopayajo daśa
GV03sb_03_u:2989: pāṇyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno vyāna ityetāvānvai puruṣo yaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:2992: tadāhuḥ | kiṃ tadyajñe kriyate yena prāṇaḥ sarvebhyo 'ṅgebhyaḥ śiva iti
GV03sb_03_u:2994: yadeva gudaṃ tredhā karoti | prāṇo vai gudaḥ so 'yam prāṅātatastamayam prāṇo
GV03sb_03_u:2997: sa yadeva gudaṃ tredhā karoti | tṛtīyamupayaḍbhyastṛtīyaṃ juhvāṃ tṛtīyamupabhṛti
GV03sb_03_u:3000: sa ha tveva paśumālabheta | ya enam medhamupanayedyadi kṛśaḥ syādyadudaryasya
GV03sb_03_u:3001: medasaḥ pariśiṣyata tadgude nyṛṣetprāṇo vai gudaḥ so 'yam prāṅātatastamayam
GV03sb_03_u:3002: prāṇo 'nusaṃcarati prāṇo vai paśuryāvaddhyeva prāṇena prāṇiti tāvatpaśuratha
GV03sb_03_u:3005: gudo vai paśuh | medo vai medhastadenam medhamupanayati yadyu aṃsalo bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:3008: atha pṛṣadājyaṃ gṛhṇāti | dvayaṃ vā idaṃ sarpiścaiva dadhi ca dvandvaṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:3011: tenānuyājeṣu carati | paśavo vā anuyājāḥ payaḥ pṛṣadājyaṃ tatpaśuṣvevaitatpayo
GV03sb_03_u:3012: dadhāti tadidam paśuṣu payo hitam prāṇo hi pṛṣadājyamannaṃ hi
GV03sb_03_u:3015: tena purastādanuyājeṣu carati | sa yo 'yam purastātprāṇastamevaitaddadhāti tena
GV03sb_03_u:3016: paścādupayajati sa yo 'yam paścātprāṇastamevaitaddadhāti tāvimā ubhayataḥ prāṇau
GV03sb_03_u:3019: tadvā etadeko dvābhyāṃ vaṣaṭkaroti | adhvaryave ca yaścaiṣa upayajatyatha
GV03sb_03_u:3023: sa upayajati | samudraṃ gaca svāhetyāpo vai samudra āpo reto reta evaitatsiñcati
GV03sb_03_u:3025: antarikṣaṃ gaca svāheti | antarikṣaṃ vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante 'ntarikṣamevaitadanu
GV03sb_03_u:3028: devaṃ savitāraṃ gaca svāheti savitā vai devānām prasavitā savitṛprasūta
GV03sb_03_u:3031: mitrāvaruṇau gaca svāheti | prāṇodānau vai mitrāvaruṇau prāṇodānāvevaitatprajāsu
GV03sb_03_u:3034: ahorātre gaca svāheti | ahorātre vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante 'horātre evaitadanu
GV03sb_03_u:3037: candāṃsi gaca svāheti | sapta vai candāṃsi sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3040: dyāvāpṛthivī gaca svāheti | prajāpatirvai prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām
GV03sb_03_u:3041: paryagṛhṇāttā imā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām parigṛhītāstatho evaiṣa etatprajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tā
GV03sb_03_u:3044: athātyupayajati | sa yannātyupayajedyāvatyo haivāgre prajāḥ sṛṣṭāstāvatyo haiva
GV03sb_03_u:3045: syurna prajāyerannatha yadatyupayajati praivaitajjanayati tasmādimāḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3049: so 'tyupayajati | yajñaṃ gaca svāhetyāpo vai yajña āpo reto reta evaitatsiñcati
GV03sb_03_u:3051: somaṃ gaca svāheti | reto vai somo reta evaitatsiñcati
GV03sb_03_u:3053: divyaṃ nabho gaca svāheti | āpo vai divyaṃ nabha āpo reto reta evaitatsiñcati
GV03sb_03_u:3055: agniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ gaca svāheti | iyaṃ vai pṛthivyagnirvaiśvānaraḥ seyam
GV03sb_03_u:3058: atha mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe | mano me hārdi yaceti tatho hopayaṣṭātmānaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3061: atha jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti | jaghanārdho vai jāghanī jaghanārdhādvai
GV03sb_03_u:3062: yoṣāyai prajāḥ prajāyante tatpraivaitajjanayati yajjāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti
GV03sb_03_u:3064: antarato devānām patnībhyo 'vadyati | antarato vai yoṣāyai prajāḥ prajāyanta
GV03sb_03_u:3065: upariṣṭādagnaye gṛhapataya upariṣṭādvai vṛṣā yoṣām adhidravati
GV03sb_03_u:3067: atha hṛdayaśūlenāvabhṛthaṃ yanti | paśorha vā ālabhyamānasya hṛdayaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3069: tasmādu paritṛdyaiva śūlākuryāttattriḥpracyute paśau hṛdayam pravṛhyottamam
GV03sb_03_u:3072: atha hṛdayaśūlam prayacati | tanna pṛthivyām parāsyennāpsu sa yatpṛthivyām
GV03sb_03_u:3076: apa evābhyavetya | yatra śuṣkasya cārdrasya ca saṃdhiḥ syāttadupagūhedyadyu
GV03sb_03_u:3077: abhyavāyanāya glāyedagreṇa yūpamudapātraṃ ninīya yatra śuṣkasya cārdrasya ca
GV03sb_03_u:3078: saṃdhirbhavati tadupagūhati nāpo nauṣadhīrhiṃsīriti tathā nāpo nauṣadhīrhinasti
GV03sb_03_u:3079: dhāmnodhāmno rājaṃstato varuṇa no muñca yadāhuraghnyā iti varuṇeti śapāmahe
GV03sb_03_u:3082: athābhimantrayate | sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyāstasmai santu yo
GV03sb_03_u:3083: 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti yatra vā etena pracarantyāpaśca ha vā
GV03sb_03_u:3084: asmāttāvadoṣadhayaścāpakramyeva tiṣṭhanti tadu tābhirmitradheyaṃ kurute tatho
GV03sb_03_u:3085: hainaṃ tāḥ punaḥ praviśantyeṣo tatra prāyaścittiḥ kriyate sa vai nāgnīṣomīyasya
GV03sb_03_u:3086: paśoḥ karoti nāgneyasya vaśāyā evānūbandhyāyai tāṃ hi sarvo 'nu yajñaḥ saṃtiṣṭhata
GV03sb_03_u:3087: etadu hāsyāgnīṣomīyasya ca paśorāgneyasya ca hṛdayaśūlena caritam bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:3091: prajāpatirvai prajāḥ sasṛjāno riricāna ivāmanyata | tasmātparācyaḥ prajā āsurnāsya
GV03sb_03_u:3094: sa aikṣatārikṣyaham | asmā u kāmāyāsṛkṣi na me sa kāmaḥ samārdhi parācyo
GV03sb_03_u:3097: sa aikṣata prajāpatiḥ | kathaṃ nu punarātmānamāpyāyayeyopa mā prajāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3104: tasmai kamekādaśinyā yajeta | evaṃ haiva prajayā paśubhirāpyāyata upainam prajāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3105: samāvartante tiṣṭhante 'sya prajāḥ śriye 'nnādyāya sa vasīyāneveṣṭvā bhavatyetasmai
GV03sb_03_u:3108: sa āgneyam prathamam paśumālabhate | agnirvai devatānām mukham prajanayitā sa
GV03sb_03_u:3109: prajāpatiḥ sa u eva yajamānastasmādāgneyo bhavati
GV03sb_03_u:3111: atha sārasvatam | vāgvai sarasvatī vācaiva tatprajāpatiḥ punarātmānamāpyāyayata
GV03sb_03_u:3115: atha saumyam | annaṃ vai somo 'nnenaiva tatprajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3120: tadyatsārasvatamanu bhavati | vāgvai sarasvatyannaṃ somastasmādyo vācā
GV03sb_03_u:3123: atha pauṣṇam | paśavo vai pūṣā paśubhireva tatprajāpatiḥ punarātmānamāpyāyayata
GV03sb_03_u:3132: tadyatpauṣṇamanu bhavati | paśavo vai pūṣā brahma bṛhaspatistasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3133: paśūnabhidhṛṣṇutamaḥ purāhitā hyasya bhavanti mukha āhitāstasmādu tatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3136: atha vaiśvadevaṃ | sarvaṃ vai viśve devāḥ sarveṇaiva tatprajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3141: tadyadbārhaspatyamanu bhavati | brahma vai bṛhaspatiḥ sarvamidaṃ viśve devā
GV03sb_03_u:3142: asyaivaitatsarvasya brahma mukhaṃ karoti tasmādasya sarvasya brāhmaṇo mukham
GV03sb_03_u:3144: athaindram | indriyaṃ vai vīryamindram indriyeṇaiva tadvīryeṇa prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3149: tadyadvaiśvadevamanu bhavati | kṣatraṃ vā indro viśo viśve devā annādyamevāsmā
GV03sb_03_u:3152: atha mārutam | viśo vai maruto bhūmo vai viḍbhūmnaiva tatprajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3157: tadyadaindramanu bhavati | kṣatraṃ vā indro viśo viśve devā viśo vai maruto
GV03sb_03_u:3158: viśaivaitatkṣatram paribṛṃhati tadidaṃ kṣatramubhayato viśā paribṛḍham
GV03sb_03_u:3160: athaindrāgnam | tejo vā agnirindriyaṃ vīryamindra ubhābhyāmeva tadvīryābhyām
GV03sb_03_u:3161: prajāpatiḥ punarātmānamāpyāyayatobhe enaṃ vīrye upasamāvartetāmubhe vīrye
GV03sb_03_u:3162: anuke ātmano kurutobhābhyāmvevaiṣa etadvīryābhyāmāpyāyata ubhe enaṃ vīrye
GV03sb_03_u:3163: upasamāvartete ubhe vīrye anuke ātmanaḥ kurute
GV03sb_03_u:3165: atha sāvitram | savitā vai devānām prasavitā tatho hāsmā ete savitṛprasūtā eva sarve
GV03sb_03_u:3174: yadyu paśvekādaśinī syāt | āgneyameva yūpa ālabherannathetarānyathāpūrvam
GV03sb_03_u:3181: teṣāṃ yatra vapābhiḥ pracaranti | āgneyasyaiva prathamasya vapayā
GV03sb_03_u:3187: yatra vai yajñasya śiro 'cidyata | tasya raso drutvāpaḥ praviveṣa tenaivaitadrasenāpaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3190: sa yadvasatīvarīracaiti | tamevaitadrasamāhṛtya yajñe dadhāti rasavantaṃ yajñaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3193: tā vai sarveṣu savaneṣu vibhajati | sarveṣvevaitatsavaneṣu rasaṃ dadhāti sarvāṇi
GV03sb_03_u:3196: tā vai syandamānānāṃ gṛhṇīyāt | aiddhi sa yajñasya rasastasmātsyandamānānāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3199: gopīthāya vā etā gṛhyante | sarvaṃ vā idamanyadilayati yadidaṃ kiṃ cāpi yo 'yam
GV03sb_03_u:3202: divā gṛhṇīyāt | paśyanyajñasya rasaṃ gṛhṇānīti tasmāddivā gṛhṇīyādetasmai vai
GV03sb_03_u:3203: gṛhṇāti ya eṣa tapati viśvebhyo hyenā devebhyo gṛhṇāti raśmayo hyasya viśve
GV03sb_03_u:3204: devāstasmāddivā gṛhṇīyāddiveva vā eṣa tasmādveva divā gṛhṇīyāt
GV03sb_03_u:3206: etaddha vai viśve devāḥ | yajamānasya gṛhānāgacanti sa yaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3211: sa yasyāgṛhītā abhyastamiyāt | tatra prāyaścittiḥ kriyate yadi purejānaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3212: syānnināhyādgṛhṇīyāddivā hi tasya tāḥ purā gṛhītā bhavanti yadyu anījānaḥ syādya
GV03sb_03_u:3213: enamījāna upāvasito vā paryavasito vā syāttasya nināhyādgṛhṇīyāddivā hi tasya tāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3217: dhārayangṛhṇīyāddhiraṇyaṃ voparyupari dhārayangṛhṇīyāttadetasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya
GV03sb_03_u:3220: athāto gṛhṇātyeva | haviṣmatīrimā āpa iti yajñasya hyāsu rasaḥ prāviśattasmādāha
GV03sb_03_u:3221: haviṣmatīrimā āpa iti haviṣmān āvivāsatīti haviṣmānhyenā yajamāna āvivāsati
GV03sb_03_u:3224: haviṣmāndevo adhvara iti | adhvaro vai yajñastadyasmai yajñāya gṛhṇāti taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3225: haviṣmantaṃ karoti tasmādāha haviṣmāndevo adhvara iti
GV03sb_03_u:3227: haviṣmān astu sūrya iti | etasmai vai gṛhṇāti ya eṣa tapati viśvebhyo hyenā devebhyo
GV03sb_03_u:3228: gṛhṇāti raśmayo hyasya viśve devāstasmādāha haviṣmān astu sūrya iti
GV03sb_03_u:3230: tā āhṛtya jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ sādayati | agnervo 'pannagṛhasya sadasi

GV03sb_03_u:3236: viśvebhyo hyenā devebhyo gṛhṇātīndrāgnī hi viśve devāstāḥ punarāhṛtyāgreṇa patnīṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3237: sādayati sa jaghanena patnīm paryetya tā ādatte
GV03sb_03_u:3239: sa uttareṇa niṣkrāmati | tā uttarāyāṃ śroṇau sādayati mitrāvaruṇayorbhāgadheyī
GV03sb_03_u:3243: guptyai vā etāḥ parihriyante | agniḥ purastādathaitāḥ samantam palyaṅgyante nāṣṭrā

GV03sb_03_u:3245: tadāsu viśvāndevāntsaṃveśayatyete vai vasatāṃ varaṃ tasmādvasatīvaryo nāma vasatāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3246: ha vai varam bhavati ya evametadveda
GV03sb_03_u:3248: tāni vā etāni sapta yajūṃṣi bhavanti | caturbhirgṛhṇātyekena jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3249: sādayatyekena pariharatyekenāgnīdhre tāni sapta yatra vai vācaḥ prajātāni candāṃsi
GV03sb_03_u:3250: saptapadā vai teṣām parārdhyā śakvaryetāmabhisampadaṃ tasmātsapta yajūṃṣi
GV03sb_03_u:3254: tāntsamprabodhayanti | te 'pa upaspṛśyāgnīdhramupasamāyanti ta ājyāni gṛhṇate
GV03sb_03_u:3257: atha rājānamupāvaharati | iyaṃ vai pratiṣṭhā janūrāsām
GV03sb_03_u:3260: antareṇeṣa upāvaharati | yajño vā anastannveva yajñānna bahirdhā karoti grāvasu
GV03sb_03_u:3261: sammukheṣvadhinidadhāti kṣatraṃ vai somo viśo grāvāṇaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3265: sa upāvaharati | hṛde tvā manase tveti yajamānasyaitatkāmāyāha hṛdayena hi manasā
GV03sb_03_u:3266: yajamānastaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate yatkāmyā yajate tasmādāha hṛde tvā manase tveti
GV03sb_03_u:3268: dive tvā sūryāya tveti | devalokāya tvetyevaitadāha yadāha dive tveti sūryāya tveti
GV03sb_03_u:3270: yajña ūrdvamimaṃ yajñaṃ dive deveṣu dhehītyevaitadāha
GV03sb_03_u:3272: soma rājanviśvāstvam prajā upāvaroheti | tadenamāsām prajānāmādhipatyāya
GV03sb_03_u:3276: etatkaroti yadāha viśvāstvam prajā upāvaroheti kṣatraṃ vai somastatpāpavasyasaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3277: karoti taddhedamanu pāpavasyasaṃ kriyate 'thātra yathāyathaṃ karoti yathāpūrvaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3278: yadāha viśvāstvām prajā upāvarohantviti tadenamābhiḥ prajābhiḥ pratyavarohayati
GV03sb_03_u:3279: tasmādu kṣatriyamāyantamimāḥ prajā viśaḥ pratyavarohanti tamadhastādupāsata
GV03sb_03_u:3282: atha samidhamabhyādadhadāha | devebhyaḥ prātaryāvabhyo 'nubrūhīti candāṃsi vai
GV03sb_03_u:3283: devāḥ prātaryāvāṇaścandāṃsyanuyājā devebhyaḥ preṣya devānyajeti vā
GV03sb_03_u:3286: tadu haika āhuḥ | devebhyo 'nubrūhīti tadu tathā na brūyāccandāṃsi vai devāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3287: prātaryāvāṇaścandāṃsyanuyājā devebhyaḥ preṣya devānyajeti vā anuyājaiścaranti
GV03sb_03_u:3292: yātayāmāni vai devaiścandāṃsi candobhirhi devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ samāśnuvata na vā

GV03sb_03_u:3297: yannimiṣati sa haivāsya pratigarastadu tathā na kuryādyadi nidrāyādapi kāmaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3298: svapyātsa yatra hotā prātaranuvākam paridadhāti tatpracaraṇīti srugbhavati tasyāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3301: yatra vai yajñasya śiro 'cidyata | tasya raso drutvāpaḥ praviveśa tamadaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3305: yābhya u caivaitāṃ devatābhya āhutiṃ juhoti tā evaitatprīṇāti tā asmai tṛptāḥ prītā
GV03sb_03_u:3308: sa juhoti | śṛṇotvagniḥ samidhā havam ma iti śṛṇotu ma idamagniranu me
GV03sb_03_u:3309: jānātvityevaitadāha śṛṇvantvāpo dhiṣaṇāśca devīriti śṛṇvantu ma idamāpo 'nu me
GV03sb_03_u:3310: jānantvityevaitadāha śrotā grāvāṇo viduṣo na yajñamiti śṛṇvantu ma idaṃ grāvāṇo 'nu
GV03sb_03_u:3311: me jānantvityevaitadāha viduṣo na yajñamiti vidvāṃso hi grāvāṇaḥ śṛṇotu devaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3312: savitā havam me svāheti śṛṇotu ma idaṃ devaḥ savitānu me jānātvityevaitadāha savitā
GV03sb_03_u:3313: vai devānām prasavitā tatsavitṛprasūta evaitadyajñasya rasamacaiti
GV03sb_03_u:3315: athāparaṃ caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvā | udaṅ prayannāhāpa iṣya hotarityapa ica
GV03sb_03_u:3317: tamārunddha etānu caivaitadanutiṣṭhate nedenānantarā nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hinasanniti
GV03sb_03_u:3323: ta udañco niṣkrāmanti | jaghanena cātvālamagreṇāgnīdhraṃ sa yasyāṃ tato diśyāpo
GV03sb_03_u:3324: bhavanti tadyanti te vai saha patnībhiryanti tadyatsaha patnībhiryanti
GV03sb_03_u:3326: yatra vai yajñasya śiro 'cidyata | tasya raso drutvāpaḥ praviveśa tamete gandharvāḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3329: te ha devā ūcuḥ | iyamu nveveha nāṣṭrā yadime gandharvāḥ kathaṃ nvimamabhaye
GV03sb_03_u:3332: te hocuḥ | yoṣitkāmā vai gandharvāḥ saha patnībhirayāma te patnīṣveva gandharvā
GV03sb_03_u:3335: te saha patnībhirīyuḥ | te patnīṣveva gandharvā jagṛdhurathaitamabhaye nāṣṭre
GV03sb_03_u:3338: tatho evaiṣa etat | mahaiva patnībhireti te patnīṣveva gandharvā
GV03sb_03_u:3341: so 'po 'bhijuhoti | etāṃ ha vā āhutiṃ hṛtāmeṣa yajñasya rasa upasameti tām
GV03sb_03_u:3345: tamapo yācati yābhya u caivaitāṃ devatābhya āhutiṃ juhoti tā evaitatprīṇāti tā asmai
GV03sb_03_u:3346: tṛptāḥ prītā etaṃ yajñasya rasaṃ saṃnamanti
GV03sb_03_u:3348: sa juhoti | devīrāpo apāṃnapāditi devyo hyāpastasmādāha devīrāpo apāṃnapāditi yo
GV03sb_03_u:3349: va ūrmirhaviṣya iti yo va ūrmiryajñiya ityevaitadāhendriyāvānmadintama iti
GV03sb_03_u:3350: vīryavānityevaitadāha yadāhendriyāvāniti madintama iti svādiṣṭha ityevaitadāha taṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3351: devebhyo devatrā dattetyetadenā ayāciṣṭa yadāha taṃ devebhyo devatrā datteti
GV03sb_03_u:3352: śukrapebhya iti satyaṃ vai śukraṃ satyapebhya ityevaitadāha yeṣām bhāga stha
GV03sb_03_u:3356: 'gninā psātaḥ syādevameṣāhutiretayā devatayā psātā bhavati rājānaṃ vā
GV03sb_03_u:3357: etābhiradbhirupasrakṣyanbhavati yā etā maitrāvaruṇacamase vajro vā ājyaṃ retaḥ
GV03sb_03_u:3358: somo nedvajreṇājyena retaḥ somaṃ hinasānīti tasmādvā apaplāvayati
GV03sb_03_u:3360: atha gṛhṇāti | samudrasya tvākṣityā unnayāmītyāpo vai samudro 'psvevaitadakṣitiṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3361: dadhāti tasmādāpa etāvati bhoge bhujyamāne na kṣīyante
GV03sb_03_u:3364: tadyanmaitrāvaruṇacamasena gṛhṇāti | yatra vai devebhyo yajño
GV03sb_03_u:3368: ta āyanti | pratyupatiṣṭhate 'gnīccātvāle vasatīvarībhiśca hotṛcamasena ca sa
GV03sb_03_u:3369: uparyupari cātvālaṃ saṃsparśayati vasatīvarīśca maitrāvaruṇacamasaṃ ca samāpo
GV03sb_03_u:3370: adbhiragmata samoṣadhībhiroṣadhīriti yaścāsau pūrvedyurāhṛto yajñasya raso
GV03sb_03_u:3375: yaścādyāhṛtastamevaitadubhayaṃ saṃsṛjāma iti vadantastadu tathā na kuryādyadvā
GV03sb_03_u:3376: ādhavanīye samavanayati tadevaiṣa ubhayo yajñasya rasaḥ saṃsṛjyate 'tha hotṛcamase
GV03sb_03_u:3381: ta āyanti | taṃ hotā pṛcatyadhvaryo 'verapā ityavido 'pā ityevaitadāha tam
GV03sb_03_u:3384: sa yadyagniṣṭomaḥ syāt | yadi pracaraṇyāṃ saṃsravaḥ pariśiṣṭo 'laṃ homāya syāttaṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3385: juhuyādyadyu nālaṃ homāya syādaparaṃ caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvā juhoti yamagne
GV03sb_03_u:3386: pṛtsu martyamavā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ sa yantā śaśvatīriṣaḥ svāhetyāgneyyā
GV03sb_03_u:3388: puruṣasammito vā agniṣṭoma evaṃ juhuyādyadyagniṣṭomaḥ syāt
GV03sb_03_u:3391: paridhayastrīṇyukthānyetairu hi tarhi yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yadyu atirātro vā ṣoḍaśī
GV03sb_03_u:3392: vā syānnaiva juhuyānna madhyamam paridhim upaspṛśetsamudyaiva tūṣṇīmetya
GV03sb_03_u:3395: ayuṅgā-ayuṅgā ekadhanā bhavanti | trayo vā pañca vā pañca vā sapta vā nava vā nava
GV03sb_03_u:3396: vaikādaśa vaikādaśa vā trayodaśa vā trayodaśa vā pañcadaśa vā dvandvamaha
GV03sb_03_u:3397: mithunam prajananamathā tha eṣa eko 'tiricyate sa yajamānasya
GV03sb_03_u:3398: śriyamabhyatiricyate sa vā eṣāṃ sadhanaṃ yo yajamānasya śriyamabhyatiricyate
GV03sb_03_u:3402: athādhiṣavaṇe paryupaviśanti | athāsyāṃ hiraṇyam badhnīte dvayaṃ vā idaṃ na
GV03sb_03_u:3403: tṛtīyamasti satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ ca satyameva devā anṛtam manuṣyā agniretasaṃ vai
GV03sb_03_u:3404: hiraṇyaṃ satyenāṃśūnupaspṛśāni satyena somam parāhaṇānīti tasmādvā asyāṃ
GV03sb_03_u:3407: atha grāvāṇamādatte | te vā ete 'śmamayā grāvāṇo bhavanti devo vai somo divi hi
